hotels.name: De Paris Hotel
hotels.description:
Hotel de Paris is a charming boutique hotel that offers stylish rooms and a large courtyard garden perfect for enjoying a relaxing meal outdoors. A private bar with an open fireplace is suitable for a night cap.

Rooms and suites at De Paris are luxuriously furnished and offer air-conditioning, a minibar and a work desk. Every room has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Private bathroom provides a hairdryer, a bathrobe and free toiletries.

The hotel is situated in the elegant area of the city full of bars and restaurants, and just a few steps away from the main institutions such as Parliament, Palace of Congress, Opera House, Art Gallery and Main Boulevard.

Ironing, laundry and dry cleaning services are available. The reception is open 24 hours a day and breakfast buffet is served each day.

The nearest bus stop is only 50 metres from the property, while the Main Bus Station can be reached in 300 metres. Tirana Airport is 15 km away.

hotels.name: Hotel Green
hotels.address: Rruga Kavajes. Kombinat Km 2. Vaqarr VaqarrTirana
hotels.description:
Located in a suburb of Tirana, Hotel Green is just a couple of steps from the national road Tirana-Durres. Surrounded by a garden, the hotel offers an on-site bar and restaurant serving traditional and international dishes.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private bathroom with shower. Guests can park their car for free on site.

Breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant each day. The front desk is open 24 hours a day and room service is available.

The centre of Tirana is 7.4 km away. The famous Blloku Area, an upmarket part of town known as a shopping destination and entertainment site, can be reached in 3 km. Boutiques, shops, restaurants, trendy bars, pubs, and cafes can be found in abundance.

Main Bus Station is 2 km away, while the Train Station can be reached in 2.3 km. Tirana Airport is 18 km  away.

hotels.name: Theranda Hotel
hotels.address: Rr. Andon Zako Cajupi Villa 6 & 7 Villa 6 & 7TiranëShqipëri
hotels.description:
Set in Tirana, 1.2 km from Skanderbeg Square, Theranda Boutique Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Theranda Boutique Hotel offers a sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, Pyramid of Tirana and Rinia Park. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 15 km from Theranda Boutique Hotel.

hotels.name: Seven Hotel
hotels.address: KAVAJA STREET, CLOSE TURKISH AMBASSY TIRANA
hotels.attractions: Skanderbeg Square: within 500 metre
hotels.description: This hotel enjoys an enviable setting in Tirana. The hotel is situated within easy access of a number of the city's most prominent attractions, including the National Bank of Albania, National Museum of History, Skanderbeg Square, the Ministry of Economy, Trade and Energy and the Palace of Culture. Guests are afforded an insight into the rich culture and history of the area. This charming hotel is draped in traditional style, beautifully coupling it with contemporary convenience. The guest rooms are beautifully appointed, featuring muted tones and a peaceful ambience. Those travelling for work purposes will appreciate the excellent business facilities that the hotel has to offer.

hotels.name: Viktoria
hotels.address: Rruga E Elbasanit Km 4 Sauk SaukTirana
hotels.description:
Located in a new residential area at the edge of Tirana, the eco-friendly Hotel Viktoria Tirana offers air-conditioned rooms with LCD TV and free Wi-Fi. Free private parking is guarded every night, and a public bus leading to the city centre frequently stops by the hotel.

A restaurant serving Albanian and international dishes and a lounge bar can be found on site. A large garden is also at guests disposal. Hotel Viktoria Tirana is equipped with solar panels for heating water and features various other energy-saving systems.

The biggest shopping centre in Albania is in the immediate vicinity. Numerous restaurants, clubs, wellness centres and a gaming centre with bowling alleys and pool tables are within a 1 km radius and can easily be reached by bus.

Front desk can arrange car rental, as well as airport shuttle service. The centre of Tirana is 5 km away and the Central Bus Station is 6 km away. Please inform Hotel Viktoria Tirana in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

hotels.name: Bel Conti Hotel
hotels.description:
Just steps away from a private sandy beach, Bel Conti Hotel in Durrës offers elegantly decorated rooms with a balcony. The hotels modern interiors house an elegant restaurant and a bar. Free Wi-Fi in public areas and free private parking are provided.

All rooms come with carpeted floors, a TV and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with shower and a hairdryer. All rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels.

Hotel Bel Conti front desk operates 24 hours a day and offers room service with possibilities for breakfast in the room. Dry cleaning and ironing services, as well as currency exchange, are available at the hotel.

Guests can rent jet-skis 500 metres from the hotel. A swimming pool and an entertainment centre are within an 8 km radius.

The centre of Durrës is at a distance of 12 km, and Mother Theresa Airport is 25 km away. Bel Conti charges for airport shuttle service, which is available upon request. Please inform Bel Conti Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Swimming pool #1 is closed from Tue 10 May 2022 until Tue 31 May 2022

hotels.name: Pik Loti Hotel
hotels.description:
Offering free Wi-Fi and free secured parking in the centre of Tirana, the family-run Hotel Pik Loti is within only 300 metres from the historic Tabak Bridge and the Pyramid.

All rooms feature air conditioning, a TV with cable channels and a small fridge. Each room also features a private bathroom with a shower, a bidet and a hairdryer.

Pik Loti has a lounge bar where guests can relax by sampling snacks and a wide selection of local and international drinks. Breakfast can also be served there or in the room.

Guests can find a fitness centre just a short walk away. The popular Blloku neighbourhood is 400 metres from the property and features numerous entertainment options, bars, restaurants and clubs. Shopping streets are located all around the area. The biggest shopping centre in Tirana can be reached in 15 minutes.

Tiranas Old Castle is 300 metres away, while the Skanderbeg Square is at a distance of 500 metres. A bus stop is in front of the property. Tirana Train Station and Bus Station, with frequent links to Durrës and the coast, is within 1 km. Tirana Airport is 18 km from the Pik Loti Hotel. Please inform Hotel Pik Loti in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

hotels.name: Hotel Parlamenti
hotels.description:
Hotel Parlamenti is located in the historic centre of Tirana, next to the Albanian Parliament. The Skenderbeg Square and the main promenade can be reached in 5 minutes. The hotel features a bar and dining area where breakfast and lunch are served.

All rooms feature air-conditioning, a TV and a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Rooms also feature a balcony. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

There is a Chinese restaurant right next to the hotel, as well as a grocery store. A restaurant serving traditional local specialties is located just 100 metres away.

A spacious park with a promenade can be found just a few hundred metres from Parlamenti Hotel. Tennis and football courts can be reached in 5 km. Tabak Bridge can be reached in 2 minutes on foot, while the National Museum is a 5-minute walk away.

The Main Bus Station is 900 metres from the hotel, while the Train Station is 1.4 km away. Tirana Airport can be reached in 15 km.

hotels.name: White Dream Hotel
hotels.address: Rr. Elbasanit pasi kalon Pallatin e Brigadaveperballe shkolles se Policise ne SaukTirana
hotels.description:
Featuring spa and wellness facilities including a swimming pool, gym and massage centre, White Dream Hotel houses a winery and a stylish restaurant. Upon arrival, guests can choose between uniquely designed units which all have free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and an LCD TV.

The modern-style rooms and suites at the White Dream are decorated in different styles and colour schemes. Each unit has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Albanian and international specialities are served at the hotels restaurant, and special dietary needs can be catered for. A wide selection of alcoholic and soft beverages can be tasted at the bar, which also attracts local visitors.

Front desk is attended 24 hours a day and offers room service, as well as dry cleaning and ironing services. Free newspapers are available.

Hotel White Dream is located 4 km from the Skanderbeg Square and provides free private parking. The Adriatic Sea is at a distance of 28 km.

hotels.name: Dajti Tower Belvedere
hotels.address: National Park Of Dajti Mountain Bb TiranaAlbanien
hotels.description:
Enjoying a tranquil position on top of the mountain, Dajti Tower - Hotel Belvedere offers modernly designed rooms with free Wi-Fi in the tourist area of Dajti National Park.

Set at a height of 1000 metres above sea level, the hotels rooms offer panoramic views of either the city or the national park. They are all air conditioned and equipped with minibars, satellite TVs, desks and private bathrooms.

Guests can relax with a variety of cocktails at the Belvedere Bar, while the restaurant serves samples of traditional Albanian and Mediterranean recipes. Hotel veranda boasts marvelous views of Tirana and the natural landscape.

Belvedere Hotel has 3 rooms for conferences, seminars and similar kinds of gatherings. They are equipped with multimedia facilities.

You can reach the hotel by car or by using the Dajti Ekspres cable car, largest of its kind in the Balkans. The cable car ride from the hotel to the city lasts 15 minutes, and it takes a 1-hour car drive from the city centre to the hotel. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

hotels.address: Street Vaso Pasha Bajram Curri1000 Tirana
hotels.description:
Ejna Hotel is located in the popular Blloku District, close to Agimi Cinema and 500 metres from the city centre. Several cultural sights, shops, restaurants and clubs can be found within only 150 metres.
Featuring a multilingual staff, free secured parking and car rental services right in the heart of Tirana, the boutique Hotel Ejna has elegant air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a lively bar with a large garden terrace. Each room has LCD satellite TV, while some of them have a terrace.The HOTEL EJNA is a Tourist hotel. Located in Tirana area. Shopping is accessible by bus/taxi and the nightlife/restaurants are easily accessible by taxi or bus from the hotel.

hotels.name: Hotel Relax
hotels.description:
Set 1.9 km from the centre of Tirana, in a business area, Hotel Relax is an elegant hotel reconstructed in 2012. The hotel features a rooftop lounge bar Belvedere that offers unique views of the town and a perfect spot to relax in the evening.

All rooms at Relax Hotel are modernly furnished and air-conditioned. They feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a work desk, a safe and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the property. The en-suite bathrooms feature free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The hotel also features 24 hour front desk service and free camera-surveilled parking. Laundry and ironing service are available, as well as room service. Breakfast is served in the dining room each morning.

Meeting and banquet facilities are available, as well as car rental, and shuttle service can be arranged at a surcharge. The hotel is located in the vicinity of numerous banks and international businesses. The industrial zone and the shopping centre can be reached in 3 km.

Local buses stop right in front of the hotel, while the Main Train Station can be reached in 2 km. Tirana Airport is 10 km away. Please inform Hotel Relax in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

hotels.description:
Hotel Leonardo is located next to its private beach with free use of deck chairs and parasols, 9 km from the centre of Durres. Featuring free Wi-Fi and free parking, it offers a restaurant, fitness centre and air-conditioned accommodation.

All rooms and suites comprise a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Each unit has a private bathroom with a shower or a bathtub.

A local bus stop is at a distance of 20 metres. Durres is known for its Amphithetare which is 10 km away. The capital of Tirana with its airport is 35 km from the Leonardo Hotel.

hotels.description:
Centrally located in the heart of Tirana, Hotel Vila e Arte features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The city centre is a 5-minute walk away. Scanderbeg Square, the main pedestrian zone, is only few steps from the hotel.

A TV, a telephone and a minibar are featured in each room. The private bathroom comes with a bath or a shower.

Guests can start their day with buffet-style breakfast. The on-site restaurant and the lobby bar are at guests disposal.

The main city shopping district can be reached in a few minutes on foot from the Vila e Arte. Tirana artificial lake is about a 20-minute walk from the Hotel. A 13-century castle can be reached by car in 30 minutes.

Tirana Bus Station is a 10-minute walk away. Tirana Airport is 15 km from Hotel Vila e Arte.

hotels.description:
Featuring a beachfront location with sun loungers and parasols, Hotel Virginia is set in Durrës. Free WiFi is available and free private parking is provided.

Each air conditioned room is fitted with a flat-screen cable TV and a fridge. Every room includes a furnished balcony. The bathroom comes with a shower and a bidet. For your comfort, you will find slippers and free toiletries.

Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and restaurant. An indoor play area for kids is also offered at the property.

Port of Durres is 1.6 km from Hotel Virginia, while Durres Amphiteatre is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana Airport, 41 km from the property. hotels.name: Kotoni
hotels.description:
Set in the heart of Tiranas prestigious Blloku area, Boutique Hotel Kotoni offers elegantly decorated, modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. The à-la-carte restaurant serves international and local cuisine.

Decorated in warm tones, rooms are bright and spacious with large windows and matching curtains. Air conditioning and LCD TVs with satellite channels are available in each room. Some rooms feature a private spa bath.

The 2-floor restaurant serves traditional Albanian and international cuisine, prepared with organic ingredients. During summer days guests can enjoy al fresco dining on a large terrace.

Set next to governmental buildings including the Prime Ministers office, Kotoni Boutique Hotel is a good starting point for exploring Tiranas landmarks. Many restaurants, bars and clubs are within a 150-metre reach. Museums and galleries can also be explored on foot.

The Main Train Station is 2 km away, while Tirana Airport is 15 km away from the property. A pick-up service can be organised upon request. Free on-site parking is available.

hotels.name: Akropoli Hotel
hotels.address: Bulevardi i Pishave 2001 Golem, Durrës, Albania
hotels.description:
Located 8 km from the centre of Durrës, Akropoli Hotel offers an outdoor pool and a restaurant that serves traditional Albanian dishes. The beach is just 80 metres away and free WiFi access is available in the hotel.

All rooms come with a TV and pay-per-view channels, as well as a fridge. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms offer balcony with sea views.

Surrounded with a garden, Hotel Akropoli runs a 24-hour front desk, and also offers a café bar with a terrace. A childrens playground is also available.

Akropli Hotel offers car and quad rental service, as well as water sport opportunities, such as parasailing, jetski and airstream, at a location nearby.

Tirana Airport is 40 km away. The property offers free parking.

hotels.name: Hotel Lubjana
hotels.description:
Hotel Lubjana is located 6 km from the centre of Tirana, on the main road from Tirana to Durres. The on-site restaurant serves traditional specialties and international cuisine and offers a summer terrace. Free Wi-Fi and parking are available.

All rooms are air-conditioned and offer a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a wardrobe, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is fitted with a balcony.

The hotel also offers a small Wellness area with a sauna and a Turkish bath, while car rentals can be arranged by the staff. Restaurants, bars and clubs can be found 500 metres from the hotel.

There is a bus stop 200 metres from the hotel, while the Train Station can be found in Tirana, 5 km away. The Ferry Post can be found in Durres, 35 km away. Tirana Airport is 11 km away.

Situated in Tirana, 8.1 km from Skanderbeg Square, Mai Tai Resort features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 10 km of Dajti Ekspres Cable Car. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

The rooms at the resort come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All guest rooms have a desk.

Guests at Mai Tai Resort can enjoy an Italian breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Greek and Italian cuisine. A vegetarian option can also be requested.

Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 7.3 km from Mai Tai Resort, while Rock of Kavaje is 49 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 20 km from the resort.

hotels.name: Palma Hotel
hotels.description:
The hotel is conveniently situated in the centre of Berat, overlooking both Berat Castle and the old quarter of Gorica. Osum River is just a half-hour walk or a 4-minute drive away. Places of interest include the Church of St. Mary of Blachernae, which is inside Berat Castle and dates back to the 13th century. Tirana International Airport is about 82 km away.

This small, air-conditioned city hotel has spectacular views and offers 24 rooms. Amenities include a 24-hour reception, a hotel safe, currency exchange facilities and a TV lounge. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar and dine in the restaurant. Both wireless Internet access and parking are available. Guests can make use of the laundry services and the hotel also has wheelchair access.

All rooms feature a shower, bath and hairdryer, as well as a double bed, satellite/cable TV, a hifi and Internet access. Additional amenities include a safe, a minibar, a fridge, air conditioning, central heating and a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning.

hotels.name: Best Western Nov Hotel
hotels.address: Rr.Gjin Bue Shpata Nearby Selman Stermasi StadiumTirana
hotels.description:
Located near the centre of Tirana and the vibrant Blloku District, the 4-star Best Western Nov Hotel features elegantly decorated accommodation with free Wi-Fi and free private parking. LCD satellite TV and a balcony are standard facilities in all units.

Carpeted floors, a desk and a minibar are featured in all rooms and suites at the Nov Hotel. The private bathroom comes with hairdryer, slippers and bathrobes.

Selman Stërmasi Stadium is right next to the hotel, and the city centre is within a 10-minute walk from the hotel. The popular Tirana Lake is a 15-minute walk away, while Dajti Mountain National Park can be reached in 20 minutes via cable car.

Attended 24 hours a day, the hotels front desk offers dry cleaning and currency exchange services on site. A selection of local drinks is available at the bar.

Tirana Airport is 20 km away. Best Western Nov Hotel offers airport transfer service at an extra charge and upon request.

hotels.name: Tomorri
hotels.description:
The hotel is located very close to centre of Berat, less than 2 km (about 20 minutes' walk) away. Tirana is 127 km from the hotel. The nearby airport, Kucove Airport, is only 10.8 km away.

The architecture of the hotel is typical of the communist style, surrounded by tall palm trees. Built in 1975, the hotel offers guests 30 years' experience of service and tradition. The view from the terrace on the top floor, overlooking the old Mangalemi and Gorica districts, is spectacular.

The hotel provides convenient accommodation units.

Golden City Hotel & Spa, Tirana is located in the heart of Tirana, just 300 metres from the main Skandaberg Square and all major sites. This luxuriously decorated hotel features a lounge bar, free Wi-Fi and free parking for all guests.

All rooms come with air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a minibar. The private bathrooms feature a shower and free toiletries. Breakfast is served each day in the hotel dining room.

Guests can find numerous restaurants just a couple of steps from the Golden City. The famous Blloku neighbourhood offering vivid nightlife and cultural sites can be reached in 1 km.

Within walking distance, guests can find numerous business centres, government offices and embassies and entertainment areas.

The Railway Station can be found 1 km away, while the Main Bus Station is 900 metres away. Tirana Airport can be reached in 10 km.

Each room comes with satellite TV, a minibar, desk and bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

hotels.description:
Set in Tirana, 4 km from Skanderbeg Square, Hotel Denver offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a garden. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation features room service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe. At Hotel Denver all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

An Italian breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Dajti Ekspres Cable Car is 8 km from Hotel Denver, while Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa Airport, 17 km from the hotel. Please inform Hotel Denver in advance of your expected arrival time. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. At Hotel Europa each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Europa include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, Rinia Park and House of Leaves. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

All accommodation units have a desk and a seating area. The private bathroom comes with shower.

A selection of Albanian dishes can be sampled in the hotels restaurant. Guests can relax and have a drink on the terrace.

Iliria Hotel front desk operates 24 hours a day and provides room service. Dry cleaning and ironing services are available.

Iliria Boutique Hotel is steps away from the biggest park in the city. The centre of Tirana and the Main Bus and Train Station are 1 km from the hotel. Tirana Airport is 15 km away. The hotel has an on-site bar and a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Albanian and Italian dishes.

The Main Bus Station is just 500 metres from the hotel, offering ease of access to other areas to be explored. This charming hotel welcomes visitors with warm hospitality and excellent service. The guest rooms are tastefully designed, featuring a simplistic, yet inviting, style. The hotel offers a number of excellent facilities and services, meeting the needs of every type of traveller. Hotel President is located just a few steps from a pebbly beach in Shengjin. It offers an on-site restaurant and a bar with a spacious terrace. Free Wi-Fi and parking are provided on site.

All accommodation units offer air-conditioning and a balcony that overlooks the sea. It is fitted with satellite flat-screen TV, a small fridge and a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer.

The restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes and traditional Albanian specialties. There is also a lush garden on site. A grocery store can be found 300 metres from the hotel.

Castle Lezha can be reached in 15 km, while Skanderbegs Grave is also 15 km away. Lezha also features a historic museum. Laguna Patok can be reached in 17 km.

Buses to Tirana, Lezha and Durres stop just 100 metres from the hotel and pass a couple of times a day. The Ferry Port can be reached in 500 metres, while Tirana Airport is 28 km away. The rooms are all well-lit thanks to their large windows. Satellite TV and a minibar are standard facilities, and each room also has a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer.

hotels.name: Vivas Hotel
hotels.description:
Set right next to the sandy beach, Hotel Vivas features an outdoor swimming pool. It offers free Wi-Fi, an on-site restaurant and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony. The centre of Durres is 3 km away.

All rooms comprise a bathroom equipped with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Amenities in each unit include a TV and a minibar.

Rich buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the Vivas Hotels restaurant featuring a summer terrace. Deckchairs and the shade of parasols next to the pool and at the beach invite guests to relax.

Hotel facilities include a gym, table tennis facilities, beach volleyball courts and a childrens playground. Tennis courts can be reached within a 20-minute walk.

Biking and canoeing opportunities can be found in the vicinity. In addition to free private parking, car and bike rental can be arranged on site.

A local bus stop, with frequent lines to the city centre, is right in front of the hotel. The Roman Durrës Amphitheatre, one of the largest amphitheatres in the Balkan Peninsula, is 3 km away. Tirana Airport is at a distance of 35 km. Spa/wellness centre is closed from Mon 07 Nov 2022 until Wed 08 Nov 2023

hotels.name: Hotel Pepeto
hotels.address: Mbreti MONUM Nr.3 Ramazan Jella Ramazan JellaDurrës
hotels.description:
Offering free bicycle rentals for guests, Hotel Pepeto is located in Durrës, just 1.1 km from the Port of Durrës. Free WiFi access is available in the entire property; and free parking is offered on site.

A TV, a seating area, and city views are featured in each room at Pepeto Hotel, which offers an in-room desk and ironing facilities as well. Certain rooms offer a terrace or balcony and all rooms include an en suite bathroom with bidet.

A 24-hour front desk welcomes guests to the hotel. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar, or make use of the laundry facilities. Common spaces include a garden, a terrace and a shared lounge.

Durrës Amphitheatre is 300 metres from Hotel Pepeto, which is only 4 minutes drive from Niko Dovana Stadium. Tirana Airport is 25 km away.

hotels.name: Hotel Nais
hotels.address: Lagja 1 Bulevardi Epidamni Bulevardi EpidamniDurrësDurres County 2001
hotels.description:
Set in the centre of Durrës, just steps away from the amphitheatre, Hotel Nais features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and city or sea views. The nearest beach can be found just 500 metres away.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. All rooms are equipped with a small fridge.

Breakfast is served each day at the hotels restaurant, while laundry and ironing service can be arranged upon request. Restaurants, bars, cafes and shops can all be found a few steps away.

Various well-know beaches, such as Kallm and Poitezi beach can be reached in a 10-minute drive. The historical city of Kiuja can be reached by car in 40 minutes. Tirana Airport is 33 km away.

hotels.description: HotelDescription#An extremely affordable 16-room hotel constructed in 2006 and conveniently located near the Adriatic Coast on the main road linking Durres and Kavaje (Albania) and near the city centre. All the rooms in this establishment are fully equipped and guests who arrive by car will find plenty of free private parking facilities for their vehicles. The premises have a roof terrace with interesting views and a swimming pool. If guests fancy an aperitif before lunch they can order it from the poolside bar. The on-site restaurant serves delicious traditional Albanian cuisine as well as international dishes. Guests will find a beautiful beach just a few minutes from the establishment, which is only a few kilometres from Durres International Airport. Guests have a choice of individual, double and triple rooms, and the property also has 2 suites and 1 apartment.

hotels.name: Benilva Hotel
hotels.description:
Set next to its private beach with free deck chairs and parasols, the Hotel Benilva complex includes a bar and restaurant with international specialities, a childrens playground and 2 hotel buildings with free Wi-Fi and free parking.

Air conditioning, satellite TV and fridge are standard facilities in all rooms at the Benilva. Private bathroom and balcony are featured as well.

Local buses stop right in front. The Benilva is about 9 km from the centre of Durrës, which is known for its ancient Amphitheatre, the historic King Zogus Palace, the Venetian Tower and other sights.

Hotel Benilva front desk operates 24 hours a day and offers room service with possibilities for breakfast in the room. Dry cleaning and ironing services are available upon request.

Durrës Ferry Port is at a distance of 8 km. Tirana Airport is 35 km away, while the historical city of Krujë is within 40 km. Please inform Hotel Benilva in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Construction works nearby. Due to that you may hear noise during the day. Works will be completed at the end of May 2023.

hotels.name: Hotel Bella Vista
hotels.address: Rr. Pavarsia, Shkembi Kavajes Shkembi KavajesDurrës
hotels.description:
Hotel Bella Vista is located just 20 metres from the sea and features a private beach area with sun loungers and parasols. The hotel restaurant served Mediterranean specialties and features a bar with a terrace. Wi-Fi is free, as well as parking.

All rooms at the Bella Vista offer satellite TV and a mini fridge in each room. The private bathroom offers a shower and hairdryer.

Breakfast is served each day at the hotel restaurant, while the other facilities include laundry, 24-hour front desk service, packed lunches and special menus available upon request.

The centre of Durrës can be reached in 8 km. It features the Old Roman Amphitheatre, the historic King Zogus Palace, the Venetian Tower and the numerous other historic sites.

Local buses stop in front of the property, while the Ferry Port can be reached in 7 km. Tirana Airport is 30 km away. Shuttle service is available, for an additional cost. Please inform Hotel Bella Vista in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

hotels.description: This bright and modern establishment is conveniently located near the centre of Albania's capital city, Tirana. The functional hotel offers bright air-conditioned rooms with wireless Internet connection. Guests can relax with a coffee at the hotel bar or savour traditional Albanian cuisine at the on-site restaurant. The property lies within a fifteen-minute walk from the centre of Tirana and provides free private parking on site. Less than 2 km away is the upmarket Blloku District, widely known as an entertainment and shopping destination with its many boutiques, shops, restaurants, trendy bars and cafes. From this hotel, guests can also easily explore Tirana's rich mosaic of historic and natural landmarks, including castles, mosques, cathedral, many museums, canyons and waterfalls. The international airport is just 20 minutes' drive from the hotel.

hotels.name: Rogner Hotel Tirana
hotels.description:
Enjoying a privileged location on the main boulevard in the heart of Tirana, Rogner Hotel is within walking distance from the main government institutions and business headquarters. The hotel is surrounded by 30.000 square metres of Mediterranean garden and provides free high speed WiFi in all areas.

Each room comes with a full HD Led TV with satellite channels, extra large bedding, a mini bar and a work desk. The rooms are furnished with natural wood, large windows and a seating area, with either a garden or boulevard view. Complimentary water, as well as coffee & tea facilities are provided.

Rogner Hotel Tiranas restaurant offers breakfast buffet every morning. A wide range of à la carte delicacies from Austrian and Mediterranean as well as local cuisine can be selected for lunch or dinner.

Guests are welcome to enjoy the hotels swimming pool set amidst palm trees, as well as other activities including: tennis court, the Spa and Hammam centre, sauna, and a gym.

There is an optional shuttle service available to Tirana International Airport Nënë Tereza. The National Historic Museum is just 700 metres away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Please inform Rogner Hotel Tirana in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
For safety reasons, children under the age of 10 are not allowed to be left unattended in the room or other hotel premises. Their legal guardians are liable for damages/incidents caused by children in the hotel.

hotels.address: Street Kostandin Kristoforidhi Nr.1 Behind Central Polyclinic 3The street in front of the ProcureTirana
hotels.description:
Set in the very centre of Tirana, just a short walk from Skenderberg Square, SarOtel offers an on-site bar, a common terrace free WiFi and secured parking.

Each room at the SarOtel is modernly furnished and well-lit. They all feature a flat-screen TV, air-conditioning, a minibar and a desk and chair. Private bathroom provides a shower. Most rooms also offer a balcony.

Breakfast is provided daily and includes local dishes or gluten-free food. On-site sauna and hammam are available at no additional cost for hotel guests. The hotel also offers a business conference room.

Various night clubs can be found close to the hotel, while tourist agencies that organise trips are located close by. The Albanian National Museum is 150 metres away. Guests can also visit the Fine Arts Gallery and the Petrela and Preza Castles, just a short walk away.

Local buses stop 100 metres from the hotel, while the Main Train Station is 600 metres away. Tirana Airport is 18 km away. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Spa and gym facilities at this property are unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property adheres to strict physical distancing measures.

hotels.name: The Rooms
hotels.description:
Featuring a spa & wellness centre, The Rooms Serviced Apartments Tirana offers free WiFi and apartments with modern furnishings. This property is located in a prestigious area of Tirana only 1.2 km from the city centre.

All apartments provide a balcony, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and an iPad. Each unit also comprises a private bathroom with a shower or a bathtub, bidet and free toiletries.

The spa & wellness centre includes numerous facilities. It consists of a gym, a hot tub, an indoor swimming pool, a sauna and a Turkish bath. Various massage treatment are also available upon request.

The city centre is full of different sights. The most known are the Skanderbeg Square and the Main Boulevard with an abundance of restaurants, cafés and shops. Tirana International Airport is 26 km away. The city of Durres is 37 km from The Rooms Serviced Apartments Tirana. Please inform The Rooms Serviced Apartments Tirana in advance of your expected arrival time. hotels.name: Palace Hotel & Spa
hotels.description:
Featuring an outdoor pool, on-site bar, restaurant and free Wi-Fi, Palace Hotel & SPA is next to the sea and has its own private beach area. The centre of Durres is 4 km away. Guests enjoy free Spa services that include an indoor pool, saunas, hot tubs and a gym.

Luxury decorated, all rooms and suites are air-conditioned and comprise a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a sofa seating. The bathroom includes a shower and free wardrobe and toiletries. Some units offer a furnished balcony and sea views.

Palace Hotel & SPA also houses a grocery store, a currency exchange office and car rental service. Business centre and banquet facilities are available at a surcharge. Each weekend during the high season, guests can enjoy live music at the hotel.

The Old Town of Durres, preserving Amphitheater, Venetian Tower and an Antique Thermals, is 4 km away.

There is a bus stop only 10 metres from the property. Durres Ferry Port with lines to Ancona and Bari is located 4 km away. Tirana Airport is at a distance of 30 km, and shuttle service is possible at a surcharge.

hotels.description:
HeadLine : Near Selman Stermasi Stadium

Location : A stay at Classic Hotel places you in the heart of Tirana, within a 15-minute walk of Selman Stermasi Stadium and Former Residence of Enver Hoxha. This 4-star hotel is 1.7 mi (2.7 km) from Ministry of Defense and 1.2 mi (1.9 km) from Skanderbeg Square.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 14 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining : Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at Classic Restaurant, a restaurant which specializes in international cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation
  • Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve rollaway/extra beds
  • This property accepts credit cards
  • Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property

Special Instructions : This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property ahead of time using the information on the booking confirmation. If you are planning to arrive after 11:30 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests must contact the property in advance for check-in instructions. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation. Deposit is payable by credit card and is due within 48 hours of booking the reservation.

hotels.name: Vila 60 Hotel
hotels.description:
Hotel Vila 60 is located 350 metres from the centre of Tirana. It offers free Wi-Fi, free parking and air-conditioned rooms.

Brightly designed and featuring wooden decorations, all rooms have a flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and desk. The private bathroom comes with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

The reception is open 24 hours a day and provides laundry and ironing services. Breakfast is buffet style, while the restaurant menu includes specialities from international and local culinary traditions. Guests can relax in the hotels courtyard garden.

Various restarants, bars, a gym and a local bus stop are in the immediate vicinity. Tirana International Airport is 11 km away, and a pick-up service can be organised upon request.

hotels.name: Xheko Imperial Luxury Boutique Hotel
hotels.description:
The luxurious Xheko Imperial Hotel boasts a location in the very centre of Tirana, close to the big park. The Carlsberg Restaurant serves Albanian and Italian specialties and features a rooftop terrace, while the wine bar offers a wide selection of local wines.

Accommodation units are lavishly furnished with all modern amenities and luxuries. They all feature air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a minibar, a safe and French balconies. Bathrooms feature free toiletries, bathrobe and slippers and a hairdryer. A complimentary bottle of water and fresh fruit are a welcome gift for each guest.

The hotel provides luxurious setting and stylish and modern facilities such as free Wi-Fi and ironing/dry cleaning service, parking facilities and 24-hour reception and room service.

The main city square can be reached in a 10-minute walk. The front desk staff will gladly assist the guests in organising excursions, day trips and sightseeing. Shuttle service can be arranged against a surcharge.

Main Bus and Train Stations can be reached in 6 km, while the local buses stop 500 metres away. Tirana Airport is located 29 km away.

hotels.description:
HeadLine : In Tirana (Sauk)

Location : With a stay at Hotel Baron in Tirana (Sauk), you ll be a 3-minute drive from Tirana East Gate and 8 minutes from University of Tirana. This hotel is 2.6 mi (4.2 km) from Toptani Shopping Center and 2.7 mi (4.4 km) from Pyramid.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 16 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers room service (during limited hours). Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash

Special Instructions : This property offers transfers from the ferry terminal and airport (surcharges may apply). To arrange pick-up, guests must contact the property 72 hours prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property ahead of time using the information on the booking confirmation. If you are planning to arrive after 8:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests must contact the property in advance for check-in instructions. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

hotels.name: Elysee
hotels.description:
Positioned in the centre of Tirana, in an area full of embassies and residencies, Hotel Elysee is set just a 10-minute walk from Skandaberg Square. The hotel features a bar with a spacious terrace that overlooks Tirana City.

All rooms at the Elysee Hotel feature air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi, a minibar, cable TV and a desk. Private bathroom provides a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Breakfast buffet is served each day at the hotel bar. Guests can park for free at the hotels parking lot. Restaurants, cafes and bars can all be reached within a 5-minute walk.

The popular Blloku neighbourhood, famous as a shopping destination and entertainment site, as well as for vivid nightlife, can be found just 1 km away. Tirana Lake can be reached in a 10-minute walk.

Main Bus Station is 1.5 km away, while the Train Station is 2 km away. Tirana Airport can be reached in a 20-minute drive. Please inform Hotel Elysee in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

hotels.name: Hotel Doro City
hotels.address: Muhamet Gjollesha Street Md.38 H.1 Tirana
hotels.description:
Located in Tirana, Albania, Hotel Doro City is just a short walk from the centre of Tirana and all the main attractions. The hotel is equipped with an exquisite à-la-carte restaurant and a bar.

All rooms at the Doro City offer air-conditioning and Wi-Fi. They are modernly and luxuriously decorated and feature a seating area, a desk and a flat-screen TV. Private bathroom provides a shower and hairdryer.

Breakfast is served at the restaurant each morning, while guests can also make use of the snack bar and enjoy a game of tennis at the onsite courts or order massages. The hotel offers 1x 3-course dinner and 1x non alcoholic beverage for guests staying longer than 4 nights.

A gift shop is one of the facilities available, while others include room service, dry cleaning services and entertainment staff.

The centre of Tirana is 700 metres away. Guests can enjoy a walk along the busy Tirana streets or a drink at the local cafe. Tirana features several parks perfect for refreshing walks. Main Bus Station can be reached in a minutes walk, while the Mother Teresa International Airport is 16 km away. Please inform Hotel Doro City in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

hotels.name: Grand Hotel
hotels.description:
Located in the Blloku neighbourhood of Tirana, popular for numerous cafes, bars and vivid nightlife, Grand Hotel Tirana is just 500 metres from the main Skandaberg Square. The on-site à-la-carte restaurant serves international dishes, while the bar features a terrace overlooking the main street.

All rooms are air-conditioned and come with a minibar, a safe and a flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi is available in rooms and public areas. Private bathrooms feature a shower and hairdryer.

Breakfast is served each day at Grand Hotel Tirana. The reception is open 24 hours a day.

Blloku is a green area full of parks and gardens and offers various opportunities to soak in the everyday life of Tirana. The towns centre and all historic sites can be reached in 500 metres.

Local buses stop 20 metres from Grand Hotel, while the Train Station can be reached in a 15-minute walk. Tirana Airport is 25 km away and an airport shuttle can be arranged for an additional cost. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.
Swimming Pool is closed from Tue 25 Apr 2023 until Sun 31 Dec 2023

hotels.name: Tropikal Resort
hotels.description:
Facing the beachfront, Sol Tropikal Durrës offers 4-star accommodation in Durrës and has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden and restaurant. This 4-star resort offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids club and free WiFi throughout the property.

The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Sol Tropikal Durrës features some units with sea views, and all rooms have a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms include bed linen and towels.

A buffet, continental or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Sol Tropikal Durrës offers a childrens playground.

Durres Beach is 500 metres from the resort, while Shkëmbi i Kavajës Beach is 1.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 35 km from Sol Tropikal Durrës. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Sol Tropikal Durrës in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
All cots are subject to availability.

When booking more than 9 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply

A local tax of 350 ALL will be paid upon check-in at the property per person/night.

hotels.address: Shkembi I Kavajes Rruga Nacionale Durres
hotels.description:
Vila Belvedere is set in the popular beach area of Shkembi Kavajes, 6 km from the centre of Durres. Featuring free Wi-Fi and a restaurant serving Albanian cuisine, it offers an outdoor pool, a sauna and a gym.

The interior of this elegant hotel is decorated in traditional Italian style. All accommodation units comprise air conditioning, TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a private bathroom.

The nearest beach is 100 metres away. Durres Ampitheatre, the largest Roman amphitheatre in the Balkans, is in the city centre. Tirana Airport is 35 km from the Belvedere. Please inform Vila Belvedere in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

hotels.name: Vila Park
hotels.description:
HotelDescription#This is a new concept hotel built just inside Tirana Park in tranquil, natural surroundings. Thanks to its location and facilities, the hotel is ideal for visitors wanting a health-focussed holiday. Tirana University is only 100 m away, the presidential building is just 500 m and the Bllok area with the city's main restaurants and clubs is just 500 m away. Guests will find the Archaeological Museum just 10 minutes away on foot, the National Gallery of Arts 12 minutes and the National Museum just 15 minutes. It is a 25-minute drive to Durres.

Renovated in 2006, this charming city hostel comprises a total of 12 rooms, 6 of which are deluxe rooms of 50 m², and the other 6 are standard but spacious double rooms. Guests entering any of the rooms or suites of this hotel will find themselves surrounded by modern design, colours, comfort and luxury. The accommodation features modern elegant furnishings and is one of the most exclusive establishments in Albania. Further facilities on offer at this air-conditioned complex include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception and 24-hour check-in/check-out service, a hotel safe, a currency exchange facility, a cloakroom, a café and a newspaper stand. It also offers a bar, a TV lounge, a restaurant and WLAN/Internet access. Guests may take advantage of the room and laundry services and there is parking available for those arriving by car. Furthermore, the hotel is protected by security guards and cameras.

hotels.description:
HeadLine : Near Cable Car

Location : Located in Tirana, Chateau Linza Resort is in the mountains, a 1-minute drive from Cable Car and 6 minutes from Toptani Shopping Center. This 4-star hotel is 2.6 mi (4.2 km) from Pyramid and 2.6 mi (4.3 km) from National Bank of Albania.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 28 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature separate bathtubs and showers, bidets, and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel s 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Snacks are also available at the 4 coffee shops/cafes. hotels.name: Arber Hotel
hotels.address: Str. Bardhok Biba No.59 1000 Tirana Republic Of Albania 1000 Tirana
hotels.description:
Within only 200 metres from the central Skanderbeg Square in Tirana, the elegant Arber Hotel offers free Wi-Fi, free parking and a restaurant in close proximity to Tiranas most important sights. Its air-conditioned accommodation units have LCD cable TV.

Electric kettle and minibar are provided in all units. The private bathroom comes with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

A variety of Albanian, Mediterranean and international dishes can be sampled at the restaurant.

The main bus and train stations in Tirana can be found at a distance of 500 metres from the Arber, while the airport is 25 km away. The historic town of Krujë and the city of Durrës are both within a 35 km radius from the hotel.

hotels.name: Dyrrah
hotels.description:
Set on a long sandy beach just 40 metres from the sea, Hotel Dyrrah offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi, a restaurant serving Albanian and Italian specialities, and an outdoor pool with deck chairs and parasols.

All rooms come with a minibar and a private bathroom. Some rooms at Dyrrah Hotel have a balcony overlooking the pool.

The centre of Durrës is 5 km from the hotel. A historic castle and an ancient amphitheatre can be visited in the city centre.

Free private parking is provided on site. Nënë Tereza International Airport is 25 km away, while the capital city of Tirana is at a distance of 40 km. Swimming pool #1 is closed from Mon 09 Oct 2023 until Sun 31 Mar 2024

hotels.name: Castle Park
hotels.address: Drobonik 1 Km from Quarter Goricë5000 Berat
hotels.description:
Castle Parks rooms all have air conditioning and a balcony. Located on the edge of a forest, the property enjoys views of Tomori Mountain and the city of Berat.

A private bathroom, cable TV, refrigerator and parquet flooring are further features of the rooms. Some accommodation is located in detached lodges and has private entrances.

Castle Parks à-la-carte restaurant serves traditional Albanian and Italian cuisine. Food and drink can be enjoyed in the medieval themed dining hall or on the terrace. Special diet menus can be arranged upon request.

Berat Castle can be reached by car in 5 minutes. Osum River is just a 2-minute walk away. Guests can do a range of water-sports on the river, including rafting with the help of licenced instructors.

Castle Park can also arrange horseback riding, hiking and cave exploration, as well as tours of the Cobo Winery and the city of Berat.

Airport transfers can be arranged upon request. Please inform Hotel Castle Park in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

hotels.name: Dolce Vita
hotels.address: 1 KM FROM SHKEMBI I KAVAJES, 0 DURRES
hotels.attractions: DurresÂ PortÂ Authority: within 19800 metre  Spitalia Rajonal: within 16600 metre  Stadium "Niko Dovana": within 11800 metre  Center of city: within 5000 metre
hotels.description:
The hotel is situated near the beach, surrounded by pine trees, green grass and the colourful swimming pool, which immediately gives the feeling of a quiet and wonderful place to stay. It is nearly 39 km from Tirana which is one of the oldest towns, full of history beginning as far back as 627 BC.

Beautifully situated on the Adriatic Sea, on 5,000 m², the hotel is a 7-floor building with 50 rooms, 4 bars, 3 restaurants, a pizzeria, a tavern, conference facilities, room service, a disco and a car park. Guests are welcomed to the air-conditioned establishment in a lobby with 24-hour reception. A hotel safe, currency exchange facilities, a newspaper stand, playground, café and a laundry service are also provided. With a beautiful sea view and a big garden with all kinds of flowers and trees, guests will find the hotel comfortable and relaxing.

The comfortable rooms are equipped with individually regulated air conditioning, a minibar, safe, LCD satellite TV, telephone, free wireless Internet, key card door lock and a smoke detector. The en suite bathrooms are fitted with a shower and hairdryer. The rooms are furnished with double beds.

The hotel features gyms, a great outdoor swimming pool, a children's swimming area and a poolside snack bar. Sun loungers and parasols can be found at the hotel and on the beach for guests' use.

The hotel restaurants offer Albania's traditional dishes as well as European specialities. A continental breakfast buffet is served each morning and lunch and dinner are offered from set menus.

hotels.name: Hotel Villa Tafaj
hotels.description:
Located in the centre of Tirana, 1 km from the Skanderbeg Square and other sights, Hotel Villa Tafaj offers air-conditioned rooms and an on-site a-la-carte restaurant. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

All rooms come with cable TV, a minibar and a work desk. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and towels.

Villa Tafaj Hotel runs a 24-hour front desk and offers an on-site bar, restaurant and meeting facilities. The National History Museum is 500 metres away and the National Theatre of Opera and Ballet and the Palace of Culture are approximately 1 km from the property.

A public bus stop is 200 metres away and the Main Bus Station is located at a distance of 1 km. Tirana Airport is 17 km from the property. Car parking is available with extra charge. Reservation is needed. Please inform Hotel Villa Tafaj in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

hotels.name: Hotel Oaz
hotels.address: Rruga Durres Kavaje Secondary Road Km 11 Secondary Road, 11 kmTirana2504 Golem
hotels.description:
Enjoying a quiet location next to a private sandy beach, Hotel Oaz offers a swimming pool, a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine, and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and satellite TV. Local buses leading to the centre of Durrës stop 150 metres away.

Oaz Hotel combines Alpine-style exterior architecture with modernly decorated interiors. The hotels multilingual staff can provide various tourist information, and free Wi-Fi is provided in the lounge areas.

Italian, Greek and Albanian cuisine can be sampled at the hotels elegant restaurant. The bar offers a selection of local and international drinks.

Guests take relaxing walks along the promenade by the sea or enjoy a variety of water sports facilities, which can be found just 100 metres from the hotel. Jet skis and pedal boats can be rented, while banana sailing and parasailing are available as well.

Buses take 15 minutes to get to the centre of Durrës, where you can visit ancient archaeological remains. It is 11 km from the hotel and can easily be accessed by car via State Road SH4.

Tirana Airport is 25 km away, while the capital city itself is at a distance of 45 km. When booking 5 rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply.
Group Bookings for more than 20 people need to be confirmed by the Hotel.

hotels.description:
The stylish 4-star Sky Hotel Tirana is located a 10-minute walk from the major government institutions and from Skanderberg Square. It offers panoramic views over Tirana and free parking on site.

Each room is air-conditioned and comes with soft carpets, flat-screen TVs with cable and satellite channels and a bathroom equipped with bathrobes and slippers. Free Wi-fi is available in the entire hotel.

hotels.name: Berati Hotel
hotels.description:
Hotel Berati is located in the historical centre of Berati, just a few minutes away from all major attractions. It offers a restaurant and bar that serves traditional meals, while free Wi-Fi and free parking are included.

Rooms are air-conditioned and fitted with simple furnishings, satellite TV and a wardrobe. Private bathroom provides a shower. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available upon request.

The closest supermarket can be found 20 metres away. Historic sights such as the Old Town and the The Lead Mosque can be reached in a 2-minute walk. The Berat Castle, dating back to the 13th century, can be found 500 metres away.

Guests can also find the Tomorri National Park 60 km away, while rafting on Osum River can be enjoyed 50 km from Berati Hotel. Local buses stop just a few steps away, while Tirana and the international airport are 110 km from the property. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

hotels.name: Palma
hotels.description:
One of the coziest hotels in Tirana, built in 1999. Location: 5 minutes walking distance from the Grand Park with the artificial lake and the famous lively "Bllok" Area with its posh coffee shops, pubs and restaurants. Located in Tirana, Hotel Palma is a 19-minute walk from the National Arts Gallery. The hotel offers free WiFi access, a 24-hour front desk and shared living area with a TV. Free breakfast can be enjoyed on site.

All rooms feature air conditioning, a balcony and cable TV. The bathroom is complete with a bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Vending machines for snacks and drinks are available at the reception area. The breakfast room features tiled floors.

Hotel Palma is 1.3 km from Skenderberg Square and 1.4 km from the National Theatre of Opera and Ballet. Tirana Airport is 14 km away. Please inform Hotel Palma in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

hotels.name: Kristal Hotel
hotels.description:
Located 100 metres from the centre of Durrës, Hotel Kristal is set just 20 metres from the beach. It offers a bar and a restaurant that served traditional Albanian dishes. Free Wi-Fi and parking are provided.

All rooms are fitted with air-conditioning, cable TV and a small fridge. Private bathroom provides a shower and hairdryer, while the rooms also offer a balcony with a view of the sea.

Rooms service, laundry and ironing facilities, as well as currency exchange can be found on-site. The restaurant offers a spacious terrace with parasols.

Guests can find numerous other restaurants, bars and shops in the centre of Durrës. The nearest grocery store is just 20 metres away. The Durrës Amphitheatre and the Venetian Tower can be visited just 100 metres away.

Main Bus Station is 1.5 km from the property, while the Ferry Port is 1 km away. Tirana Airport can be reached in 20 km. Please inform Hotel Kristal in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

hotels.description:
Hotel Restaurant Bujtina e Gjelit is set 3 km from the centre of Tirana. Featuring free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms, it offers an outdoor pool and a restaurant serving local and international dishes.

All rooms provide a view of the swimming pool. They comprise a TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Each unit has a private bathroom with a shower or a bathtub.

Tiranas centre is full of sights, such as the Fortress of Justinian and Skanderbeg Square. The Main Boulevard is full of shops, cafés and restaurants, while nightlife can be enjoyed in Blloku Area.

A local bus stop is at a distance of 500 metres. Tirana International Airport can be reached within a 15-minute drive from the Bujtina e Gjelit Hotel.

hotels.name: Grand Hotel
hotels.description:
Set in Elbasan, Grand Hotel features a restaurant, bar, terrace, and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. There is free private parking and the property offers paid airport shuttle service.

At the hotel every room includes air conditioning, a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a city view. The units feature a wardrobe.

Guests at Grand Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The accommodation provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying.

The nearest airport is Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa Airport, 46 km from Grand Hotel. Please inform Grand Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property.

hotels.description:
Located 1.5 km from the Skenderbeg Square in the centre of Tirana, Vila Verde Rooms provides accommodation. A snack bar is located on site. Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms here come with a telephone and a TV. Some have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while others have a shared bathroom and toilet at their disposal. Most rooms are air-conditioned.

A 24-hour front desk is available at the property, as is luggage storage. The Mother Theresa Hospital is only 200 metres away from Vila Verde Rooms.

The National Arts Gallery is 1.8 km away from the property. Tirana International Airport is located at a distance of 17 km.

hotels.address: Qender Shengjin Shetitorja Wilson Near Shengjin PortShengjin1001 Lezhe
hotels.description:
Facing the beachfront, Hotel Frojd - Beach Front Resort offers 4-star accommodation in Shëngjin and has a garden, shared lounge and terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Hotel Frojd - Beach Front Resort rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Shëngjin Beach is 600 metres from the accommodation, while Ylberi Beach is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 49 km from Hotel Frojd - Beach Front Resort.

hotels.address: Rr. E Elbasanit 81 Tirana Albania 81 Tirana
hotels.description:
Surrounded by greenery and positioned just a 10-minute walk from Skandaberg Square and a 5-minute walk from the main boulevard, Hotel Sokrat features modern and colourful rooms with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Guests can make use of free parking.

All rooms at the Sokrat Hotel feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a bathroom equipped with a shower, towels, toiletries and slippers. Each room is decorated in soft colours and features modern furniture.

A rich buffet breakfast is served each day at the Sokrat Hotel. A snack bar is open all day and features a rich selection of coffee and tea. The nearest restaurant can be reached in just a few steps and serves Italian and Albanian specialties and international cuisine. An ATM is located right next to the hotel building.

Just a 5-minute walk from Hotel Sokrat, guests can find Blloku neighbourhood famous for its restaurants, bars, nightlife and shopping. The centre of Tirana can be reached in a 10-minute walk.

Local buses stop 200 metres from the Sokrat, while Tirana Airport can be found 20 km away.

hotels.name: Hotel Livia
hotels.description:
Located about 500 metres from Tiranas central Skanderbeg Square, Hotel Livia features an elegant restaurant with a large garden terrace, while its air-conditioned rooms come with TV. Free Wi-Fi is provided at the reception area.

A desk and a private bathroom with shower are standard facilities in all rooms. At the Hotel Livias restaurant guests can sample some domestic and international dishes and enjoy a variety of wines.

Livia Hotel is right on the vibrant Qemal Stafa Street. It is within a 10-minute walk from the 18th-century Tanners Bridge, Palace of Culture, Tirana Clock Tower and the Ethem Bey Mosque.

Main Train Station is 1.2 km away, while Tirana Airport is at a distance of 15 km.

hotels.name: Marea Resort
hotels.description:
Enjoying a green surrounding of pine trees just 40 metres from the sea, the Marea Resort has a private beach area with a large playground and a swimming pool. It offers elegant air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and an LCD satellite TV.

Free sun loungers and parasols are available by the pool and on the beach. Free private parking is provided on site.

The Marea Resort is on a quiet location outside Kavaja, where a number of resorts and private beaches are located. The city centre is 5 km away.

Mother Teresa Airport is at a distance of 27 km, while the capital city of Tirana is 37 km away along the SH2 Motorway. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Marea Resort in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

hotels.name: White City Hotel
hotels.description:
Hotel is located in the Boulevard Republic, where the veranda that looks BREAKFAST served the old city, and the city with beautiful mountains, etc. White City Hotel is located in a quiet area in the centre of town, near the Park and the Museal area and the banks of Berat City. It features a spacious rooftop terrace where breakfast is served that overlooks the Old Town.  Free Wi-Fi and parking are provided.

All rooms at Hotel White City are air-conditioned and colourfully furnished. They offer satellite TV, a minibar and a phone. Private bathroom provides a shower, bidet and free toiletries. Rooms are elegantly furnished and feature modern décor.

The front desk is open 24 hours a day. Room service is available and there is also a vending machine for drinks. Guests can rent bikes for free.

Numerous bars, cafes and restaurants can be found just a few steps away, in the centre of town. The Old Town and the Castle can be reached in 1 minute on foot.

The front desk can help organise various day trips and excursions to the coast and rafting on the nearby river. The Bus Station can be reached in a 1-minute walk, while the nearest airport is in Tirana, 80 km away.

hotels.description:
Featuring an on-site restaurant serving traditional Albanian and Italian cuisine, Hotel Villa Fernando Tirana offers spacious and comfortable rooms with vintage furnishings. Skenderberg Square is 1.5 km away.

All rooms are air-conditioned and comprise a flat-screen satellite TV, a safe and a minibar. Each one has a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Some rooms include a furnished balcony.

The Boutique Villa Fernando runs a 24-hour front desk, and offers an aperitif bar and a snack bar and a lounge area with a large TV. Breakfast is served buffet style on site.

Tirana Old Town, the National Theatre of Opera and Ballet and the National Arts Gallery can all be found within 1.5 km distance.

The public bus stops right in front of the hotel, while the Main Bus Station is 1 km from the Villa Fernando. Tirana Airport is 13 km away and airport shuttle service is available at a surcharge. Please inform Hotel Villa Fernando Tirana in advance of your expected arrival time. hotels.address: Rruga Llazi Miho Kombinat Km1 Kombinat1000 Tirana
hotels.description:
Enjoying a quiet location, Mustang Hotel offers an on-site bar and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The centre of Tirana is 2.5 km away.

This elegant rooms provide a flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and a seating area. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with free toiletries.

Attended 24 hours a day, the hotels front desk also offers cleaning service. A selection of local drinks is available at the bar.

Main Boulevard and Skanderbeg Square can be reached in a 10-minute drive away, while Dajti Mountain National Park can be reached in 20 minutes.

The centre of town is full of various restaurants, cafés and shops. A bus stop is at a distance of 60 metres. Tirana International Airport can be reached within 20 km from the Mustang Hotel.

hotels.address: Rruga Nacionale Aeroporti Nene Tereza Aeroporti Nene Tereza Rinas1501 Fushe-Kruje
hotels.description:
Set in Fushë-Krujë, 25 km from Skanderbeg Square, Resort Nord Park offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a kids club, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation features a shared lounge, room service and currency exchange for guests.

The units in the resort are equipped with a coffee machine. The rooms will provide guests with a dishwasher.

A continental, Italian or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Resort Nord Park offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and childrens playground. The area is popular for hiking and fishing, and car hire is available at this 4-star resort.

The accommodation provides a dry cleaning service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. With staff speaking German, English and Italian, information is available at the reception.

Dajti Ekspres Cable Car is 29 km from Resort Nord Park, while Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 25 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 7 km from the resort.

hotels.description:
HeadLine : Near Artificial Lake Park Playground

Location : With a stay at VH Broadway Tirana Hotel in Tirana, you ll be connected to the convention center, just a 3-minute walk from Selman Stermasi Stadium and 8 minutes by foot from Former Residence of Enver Hoxha. This family-friendly hotel is 0.9 mi (1.4 km) from Ministry of Defense and 1 mi (1.6 km) from Skanderbeg Square.

Rooms : Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 19 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring fireplaces and indoor private spa tubs. Your memory foam bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Kitchens are outfitted with espresso makers. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while iPod docking stations and cable programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature jetted bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Dining : All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers 24-hour room service. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee.

hotels.attractions: Durres port: within 8900 metre  Universiteti Aleksandër Moisiu Durrës: within 12000 metre  Stadiumi "Niko Dovana": within 10000 metre
hotels.description:
Located in the Shkembi i Kavajes beach area, close to Durres and very near Adriatic Sea, is Hotel Elba to welcome you for some days of relaxation. 
Facilities and services include: parking, wireless internet, a playground for the kids, souvenir shop, a private beach with a beach umbrella.
Each room features a private bathroom, air conditioner, shower, hair dryer, a desk, cable TV, mini bar. 
Hotel's restaurant has a capacity of 150 persons. It offers traditional Albanian cuisine and European cuisine. Guests can enjoy cold drinks and ice cream in on-site bar and restaurant with a spacious terrace that overlooks the sea and a children's playground.

Hotel Elba is located on the 20 km long sandy beach in Durres and 39 km from Tirana airport.
