hotels.address: Rr. Nacionale Golem Kavaje Zona GolemKavaja Zona
hotels.description:
Located in Golem, 150 metres from Mali I Robit Beach, Hotel Pishat e Buta provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a garden. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, each room comes with a balcony. Hotel Pishat e Buta offers certain rooms that include pool views, and each room has a private bathroom and a desk. Guest rooms at the accommodation feature air conditioning and a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is available daily at Hotel Pishat e Buta.

You can play tennis at the hotel.

Golem Beach is less than 1 km from Hotel Pishat e Buta, while Qerret Beach is a 15-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 43 km from the accommodation.

Featuring free Wi-Fi, Hotel Oresti Center is set in the centre of Tirana, just 50 metres from the Skanderbeg Square. It offers air-conditioned rooms and a garden with a seating area.

All rooms comprise an LCD TV with satellite channels and a fridge. Most units have a balcony, while each provides a private bathroom with a shower.

Various shops, restaurants and bars are a short walk away. National History Museum is 100 metres away. A bus station is 200 metres away, while Tirana Airport is 15 km from the Oresti.

hotels.name: Bristol Hotel
hotels.description:
Located 500 metres from the vibrant Blloku area filled with restaurants, bars and night clubs, Bristol Hotel Tirana offers air-conditioned rooms with cable TV and free WiFi. Guests can relax at the hotel bar.

The rooms all have a minibar and a private bathroom with shower. Breakfast is served buffet style.

Supermarkets, shops and some restaurants can be found in the nearest vicinity of the hotel. Public buses stop 400 metres from the hotel.

Skanderbeg Square is about 800 metres away, while the National Museum is within 1 km. Tiranas main park and its lake are about 2.5 km away.

Mother Theresa International Airport is 19 km from the Bristol Hotel, which offers airport transfer service upon request.

hotels.name: Dollari
hotels.description:
Located next to its private beach area with water sports facilities, Hotel Dollari has a restaurant serving Albanian specialities and rooms with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and a balcony. There is a bus stop in front that can take you to the city centre.

Each room gets 1 beach tent on the hotels private beach. Satellite TV, minibar, and bathroom with shower are featured in all the rooms at Hotel Dollari.

Dollari Hotel is set in the beach area outside Durrës, 6 km from the centre. Guests can visit the ancient Roman amphitheatre and the historic King Zogus Palace.

Free parking is provided. Durrës Bus Station is 3 km away, while Tirana Airport is 35 km.

hotels.description: This hotel boasts a peaceful setting in a quiet area of Tirana. The hotel is located just a 5 minutes' walking distance away from Skanderbeg Square, offering visitors the best of both worlds. This hotel is located just a 2 minutes' walk from the nearest restaurant. The famous Blloku Area is located just 2 km away. The bus station can be found just 750 metres from the hotel. Tirana Train Station is just 700 metres away. Guests can explore the wonderful town of Durres, which is just 40 km away. hotels.description:
Offering free Wi-Fi and free parking, Sky 2 Hotel Tirana is set in the heart of Tirana just 200 metres from the Main Square. It features air-conditioned accommodation and a restaurant serving authentic regional and international dishes.

Decorated in beige colours, all rooms are fitted with an LCD satellite TV, a minibar and a fridge. The private bathroom comes with shower, hairdryer, towels and free toiletries.

We provide continental buffet breakfast. Guests can also relax in an on-site lounge bar. The nearest night club is just 50 metres away.

Within 200 metres from the hotel, you can visit the Opera House, the National Theatre and the National Historic Museum. Shopping streets can be found all around the area.

The nearest bus station is 50 metres away. Tirana Airport is at a distance of 18 km and shuttle service can be organised upon request.

hotels.description:
Featuring an on-site restaurant, Hotel Muzaka is right next to the river Osum and 500 metres from the centre of Berat. Set in a traditional building, it offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access. The UNESCO-listed Berat Castle is 1.5 km away.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with free toiletries and towels. Some rooms are decorated with wooden beams.

At Hotel Muzakas restaurant guests can enjoy their breakfast and Italian cuisine. A terrace and a bar are also available.

The nearest grocery store and a bus station are 500 metres away. Excursions to Bogova Waterfall, Tomor Mountain and rafting on Osum River can be arranged in local agencies. Free on-site parking is provided.

Located in Elbasan, 39 km from Skanderbeg Square, Imperial Hotel IH provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 39 km from the hotel, while Grand Park of Tirana is 39 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 52 km from Imperial Hotel IH. hotels.name: 3A Hotel
hotels.description:
Located in the heart of Tirana, Hotel 3A is set just a couple of steps from Skenderbeg Square and numerous shops, restaurants and bars. A cafe bar and a beauty salon are available on site. The hotel also features free Wi-Fi and free parking.

Rooms are colourfully furnished with carpeted floors. All of them feature air-conditioning, a desk, a TV and a minibar. Private bathroom provides a shower.

Laundry and ironing service is also available at the 3A Hotel. An ATM machine and foreign currency exchange can also be found on site. Continental breakfast served in the cafe area on the ground floor.

Guests can find numerous restaurants and bars within a 100-metre radius. Nearest grocery store is just 20 metres away. The famous Blloku area, cultural and entertainment centre of Tirana, can be reached in just 1 km.

The Qemal Stafa stadium and shopping centre can be reached in a 15 minute drive. Main Train and Bus Station can be reached in a 5-minute drive. Please inform Hotel 3A in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

hotels.name: Green House Hotel
hotels.description:
Green House is set in Tirana, only a 15-minute walk from the centre and Skanderbeg Square. Featuring free Wi-Fi, free parking and air-conditioned rooms, it offers a bar and a restaurant serving Albanian and international dishes.

All rooms provide a TV with cable channels, a wardrobe and a desk. Each unit also has a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower and free toiletries.

Various cafés, bars and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk. Tirana International Airport is 19 km from the House Green.

hotels.name: Hotel Boutique Vila Verde
hotels.description:
Featuring a breakfast room, Hotel Vila Verde City Center is located in the heart of Tiranë, 650 metres from Skenderberg Square. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and free secured private parking. A complimentary welcome drink is offered upon arrival.

Rooms here are soundproofed and include a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer.

At Hotel Vila Verde City Center you will find a 24-hour front desk and a bar with a terrace offering city and Dajti Mountain views. A conference room is also available.

The hotel is 500 metres from National Theatre of Opera and Ballet and 1 km from National Arts Gallery. Sightseeing trips can be organised upon request. Blloku, a nightlife area, is at a distance of 1.2 km. Tirana Park and Lake are 1.5 km away.

Mount Dajt National Park can be reached within 5 km. Tirana Airport is at a distance of 14 km. Please note that theres a prepayment charge once the Guest needs an invitation letter.

hotels.description:
Set in Golem, 100 metres from a beach, Hotel Mali i Robit offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. The property provides a garden and barbecue facilities. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

The units at the hotel feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, dvd player, and a private bathroom with a bidet, a hairdryer and free toiletries. The rooms have a desk.

Hotel Mali i Robit offers a continental or buffet breakfast.

The accommodation offers a childrens playground. Bike hire and car hire are available at Hotel Mali i Robit and the area is popular for hiking and cycling.

The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa, 44 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

hotels.name: Drini Hotel
hotels.address: Rruga Durres Shijak Komuna Rrashbull Komuna Rrashbull2021 Durres
hotels.description:
Set in a quiet location in Durrës, Hotel Drini Bar Restorant is located 5 km from the centre of town and the coast. The on-site bar and restaurant serve Italian and Albanian specialities and feature a garden with a fountain.

All rooms come with air-conditioning and satellite TV, as well as a private bathroom with shower. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property, as well as free parking.

The hotel features a spacious terrace where guests can relax with a drink. Room service is available, as well as special diet menus upon request. The front desk is open 24 hours a day.

Nearest beach can be reached in 3.5 km. The centre of town features a shopping mall, a museum and one of the oldest amphitheatres in the Balkan region.

The Central Railway Station is 4 km away, while the Ferry Port can be reached in 4 km. Tirana is located at a distance of 31 km, while Tirana Airport is 21 km away.

hotels.name: Star Hotel
hotels.description:
Star Hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and cable TV on a central location in Tirana, 20 metres from the Opera and steps away from the Skanderbeg Square.

Decorated in light tones of orange, the rooms all have a desk or table with chairs. Each room is equipped with a minibar and a private bathroom with shower.

You can shop for groceries and dine at restaurants in close proximity to the hotel, while the nearest clubs are 400 metres away. Tiranas most attractive sights are all within walking distance.

Local buses stop next to the hotel. There is a shopping centre 100 metres from the hotel.

The bus station is 500 metres away, and the airport is at a distance of 17 km.

hotels.name: Hotel Skampa
hotels.description: Skampa Hotel in Durrës is surrounded by a green garden and fitted with a pool, a bar and restaurant that offers traditional and Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel is located just a few steps from a sandy beach. Free Wi-Fi and parking are provided. All the rooms are furnished with air-conditioner, shower or bath in the private bathroom and free toiletries. A cable TV, a minibar and a desk are also available in each room. Some rooms provide a unique view from the balcony. The outdoor swimming pool often features music and a disc jokey, while a playground for the children is available. Laundry service is available and the front desk is open 24 hours a day. The centre of Durrës is 10 km away. The 20-km long sandy beach strip stretches from the hotel to the centre of town. The city of Tirana can be reached in 40 km. Tirana Airport is 37 km away.

hotels.description:
HeadLine : Near Ministry of Justice

Location : With a stay at Areela Boutique Hotel, you ll be centrally located in Tirana, just a 4-minute walk from Ministry of Justice and 10 minutes by foot from Statue of the Unknown Partisan. This hotel is 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Ministry of Defense and 1 mi (1.6 km) from Skanderbeg Square.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 12 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Your memory foam bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

Dining : Satisfy your appetite at the hotel s coffee shop/cafe, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve cribs/infant beds and sofa beds
  • This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash
  • Safety features at this property include a carbon monoxide detector, a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, a first aid kit, and window guards

Special Instructions : This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

hotels.name: Hotel Ani
hotels.description:
Situated right on the sea coast of Durres and near all major sites, Hotel Ani offers air-conditioned rooms and unique views of the Adriatic sea. It features an a-la-carte restaurant and a bar. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.
All rooms are brightly furnished and offer a flat-screen TV, a phone and a private bathroom. Some rooms feature a spa bath, while some are fitted with a shower.
The hotel also features a conference room, while the restaurant offers a rich menu featuring Italian, French and traditional Albanian cuisine. The restaurant also offers a terrace, while the front desk is open 24 hours a day. Parking is also offered. The guests can either enjoy a walk along the seaside or visit the historical sites like Amphitheater and Archaeology museum. Hotel Ani is located right next to the sandy beach strip that stretches over 20 km. The city of Tirana can be reached in 35 km, while Tirana Airport is 20 km away.The HOTEL ANI is a  hotel. Providing free Wi-Fi and free private parking next to an artificial lake, Hotel Restaurant Dreri offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs and minibars, while its gastronomical offer includes Albanian, Italian and international dishes.

Guests can relax with a drink on the hotel terrace. There is a grocery shop next door.

Tirana centre is a 7-minute car drive from the Dreri Restaurant Hotel.  There you can find the National History Museum and the Archeological Museum, as well as some art galleries and the historic fortresses of Petrela and Preza.

Featuring a private beach area on the long sandy coastline south of Durrës, Hotel Kamomil is fully renovated and offers colourful air-conditioned rooms, each with a sea view. Free WiFi is available and free parking is provided.

Every room comes with a flat-screen TV. Private bathrooms come with a bath or a shower and free toiletries. All units come with a balcony.

The Kamomil boasts a bar with terrace and a restaurant serving Albanian and Italian dishes. The hotel also features a small clinic and medical advice can be provided upon request.

Durrës centre is approximately 10 km from the hotel and buses to the centre stop right by the property. There you can visit the historic amphitheatre, Venetian Tower and the King Zogu Palace.

hotels.name: Hotel Whispers
hotels.description:
Located 10 km from the centre of Durres, Hotel Whispers is set just 30 metres from a pebbly beach. It offers a private beach area with sun loungers and parasols, an on-site bar and restaurant, as well as free Wi-Fi and free parking.

All accommodation units offer a seating area with cable TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area and a balcony. Private bathroom provides a shower. The units are air-conditioned and feature a view of the sea.

The bar and restaurant have a spacious terrace and serve a variety of drinks and Italian and Albanian specialties. There is also a supermarket just a few steps from the hotel.

Local buses stop 15 metres away, while the Bus Station, with lines to Tirana and Saranda, can be found 600 metres away. Tirana Airport is 30 kilometres away.

hotels.description:
Only steps away from a sandy beach and 10 km from the centre of Durres, Hotel Adriatik 2 offers air-conditioned rooms with cable TV and free Wi-Fi. It features an on-site bar and restaurant with a summer terrace. Free private parking is available on site.

All rooms include a minibar and a private bathroom with shower. Some rooms have balconies overlooking the sea.

The on-site restaurant offers Mediterranean, Albanian and traditional cuisine. A grocery shop can be found 100 metres away.

The National Archaeological Museum can be found in the centre of Durres. Durres Amphitheatre, built during emperor Trajans reign, is 10 km away. The Cape of Rodon, with the historic Rodoni Castle is about 50 km from the Adriatik 2 Hotel.

A bus stop is right in front of the hotel, while the Main Bus Station is 5 km away. Durres Ferry Port with lines to Bari and Ancona is 10 km from the property. Tirana Airport is 40 km away.

All the rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar and a work desk. Featuring a hairdryer, private bathrooms are equipped with a shower and also come with free toiletries and towels. Some rooms have a balcony or a terrace.

2 KITARRAT Boutique Hotel & SPA offers a sauna, a Turkish bath and a hot tub. A laundry service, airport shuttle and a massage service are also offered.

The centre of Elbasan is located at a distance of 5 km. Shebenik-Jablanice National Park is 30 km away and Lake Ohrid is approximately 50 km from the Colombo.

Hotel Klea is in the Castle of Berat, just 40 meters from the main gate. Set in a traditional house, it offers free WiFi access in public areas and a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a terrace.

All rooms include air conditioning, a TV and a desk as well as a bathroom with a bathtub and a shower.

The on-site restaurant of Hotel Klea serves traditional homemade dishes. Other facilities offered at the property include grocery deliveries, a shared lounge and a tour desk.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including hiking. Free private parking is available on site and Tirana Airport is 81 km away.

hotels.address: Mangalem Street Kostaq Stefa Mangalem5001 Berat
hotels.description:
Hotel Belgrad Mangalem is located in Berat, just a 5-minute walk from the Old Town and the The Lead Mosque. The hotel features an on-site bar, while free WiFi is available throughout.

Each room here will provide you with a TV and air conditioning. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view from the room.

Hotel Belgrad Mangalem is housed in 2 historical buildings, placed 10 metres from each other. You will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a tour desk and luggage storage.

The Berat Castle, dating back to the 13th century, can be reached in just 500 metres. Guests can also visit the Tomorri National Park, 22 km away, while rafting on Osum River can be enjoyed 50 km from Hotel Belgrad.

The property offers free parking. Tirana Airport is 82 km away. Please inform Hotel Belgrad Mangalem in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

There is also a refrigerator.

Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and a bidet. You can enjoy mountain view and garden view from the room. Extras include pay-per-view channels and cable channels.

At Grand White City Hotel you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and barbecue facilities. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, luggage storage and a kids club.

Tirana Airport is 80 km away. The property offers free parking.

Located in Durrës, just a short walk from the beach, Casablanca Boutique Hotel offers a spacious sun terrace and an outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi access is available.

hotels.description:
Located in front of the Albanian Parliament and only 550 metres away from the Skenderbeg Square, Hotel Relax City Center is set in Tirana and provides air-conditioned accommodation. Free WiFi access is provided.

Rooms here come equipped with a flat-screen cable and satellite TV. The private bathrooms are fitted with a shower, a bidet and a hairdryer. Free toiletries and slippers are available. Each room offers a view of the garden.

Relax City Center Hotel also comprises a restaurant located only 30 metres away from the main building. A garden is at the guests disposal, as is a bar. Free private parking is provided on site.

The National Arts Gallery is 500 metres away from the hotel. The Tirana Big Park is 2 km away. Tirana Airport is located at a distance of 16 km. Please inform Hotel Relax City Center in advance of your expected arrival time. Featuring a restaurant and a private beach area, Klajdi Resort & SPA is located in Durrës. It offers modernly decorated rooms with air conditioning. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property.

Each room here provides a flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms come with a balcony, while suites also provide a seating area.

The reception desk at Klajdi Hotel stays open 24 hours a day, while the property itself includes a garden with a childrens playground. After a day on the beach, you can relax with a drink at the on-site bar.

Offering a restaurant, free private parking, and a garden with a sun terrace, Mondial Boutique Hotel is located at the outskirts of Fier. All rooms come with air conditioning and a minibar and there is free WiFi available throughout the property. Shuttle services and car rental services can be requested.

All rooms come with a flat-screen cable TV and a bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer, and free toiletries. Some units additionally feature a living area with a sofa bed, or a spa bath.

Gregarious guests can gather at Mondial Boutique Hotels bar and there also is a common lounge area featured. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including hiking.

Fiers centre is a 3-minute drive away. Bar is closed from Fri 06 Sept 2019 until Mon 28 Feb 2022

hotels.description:
Located in the heart of Tirana, 600 metres from Skenderbegs Square, Hotel Bylis provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access.

The rooms include a flat-screen cable TV, a balcony and a bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Guests can reach most major sights such as the National Theatre of Opera and Ballet, EtHem Bey Mosque and the National Museum of History with a 5-minute walk. The nearest shopping centre and the Bus Station are 2 km away.

The rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. All rooms come with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Hotel Kaceli have a balcony. The units will provide guests with a fridge.

Set in Elbasan, 40 km from Skanderbeg Square, Hotel Guri offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. The property is situated 43 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car, 40 km from Former Residence of Enver Hoxha and 40 km from Grand Park of Tirana. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. The units feature a wardrobe.

hotels.description:
Featuring a restaurant and a private beach area, Hotel GRINT is located in Durrës. Free WiFi access is available in public areas. Guests can enjoy sea views.

The air-conditioned rooms will provide you with a flat-screen TV and a balcony. Additional facilities include a small refrigerator and a dining area. The private bathroom has a bath or shower.

At Hotel GRINT you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling, fishing and diving.

This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

Hotel Bar Restorant Le Olive is located about 1 km from the centre of Elbasan. The on-site bar and restaurant serves international and traditional Albanian food and features a terrace. Free Wi-Fi and parking are provided.

All rooms offer a balcony, a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. It also offers a desk and chair, while the private bathroom provides a shower.

There is a grocery store 150 metres away, while numerous other bars and restaurants can be reached in 400 metres. The tourist agency in the centre offers excursions to Durres and Saranda, as well as car rentals.

The centre of Elbasan features an Etnographic Museum, as well as the Basilic in Tepe of Elbasan. Local buses stop 150 metres from the hotel, while the Main Bus Station is 1 km away. Tirana International Airport is 30 km away.

hotels.description:
HeadLine : Near Tanners Bridge

Situated less than 1 km from Skanderbeg Square, Hotel Domus offers 3-star accommodation in Tirana and has a bar. Featuring a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is allergy-free and is set 6 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car.

Rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at the hotel have a garden view.

À la carte and Italian breakfast options are available each morning at Hotel Domus.

Staff speak English, Spanish and Italian at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, Postbllok - Checkpoint Monument and Pyramid of Tirana. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 17 km from Hotel Domus.

hotels.description:
Nestled in a renovated historic building in the centre of Tirana, Hotel Vila Kerciku offers colourfully furnished modern rooms and a breakfast hall. There is also a snack bar on site. Free WiFi is available.

All rooms offer air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a modern bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The balconies overlook the Avni Rustemi Square.

Room service is available, while the front desk is open 24 hours a day. Breakfast is served each day in the dining hall.

There is a restaurant serving traditional specialties just a few steps from the Vila Kerciku. Skanderbeg Square, Clock Tower of Tirana and Ethem Bey Mosque can be reached in 500 metres. Numerous museums, shops and cafes can be found all around the neighbourhood.

There are a bus stop and taxi stand right in front of the hotel. Tirana Airport is 15 km away. Spa and gym facilities at this property are unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).

hotels.description:
Property Location
When you stay at Resort Teater Kame in Tirana, you'll be on a river and 8 minutes by car from Caves of Pellumbas. This hotel is 11.1 mi (17.8 km) from Mother Albania Statue and 12.2 mi (19.6 km) from Qemal Stafa Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 8 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/café. The hotel also offers room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 8 AM to 11:30 AM for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours.

hotels.description: This property is beautifully located at the heart of Tirana. The hotel lies close to many of the city's most prominent attractions. The centre of the city is just a 2 minutes' walking distance away. The property is located within easy access of many places of interest, including the National Library and the National Museum and Theatre. A wealth of shopping, dining and entertainment venues can be found nearby. Links to the public transport network can be found close to the property. The property comprises beautifully-designed guest rooms, which are well equipped with modern amenities. Guests can sit back on the terrace, with a refreshing cocktail, and admire the stunning city views.

hotels.description:
Situated in Tirana, within 1.2 km of Skanderbeg Square and 6 km of Dajti Ekspres Cable Car, Lugano Hotel features accommodation with a terrace and as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk and a TV. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Speaking English and Italian at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near Lugano Hotel include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, House of Leaves and National Museum of History Albania. The nearest airport is Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

hotels.description:
Featuring a bar, shared lounge, garden and free WiFi, Hotel Rex is set in Tirana, 1.1 km from Skanderbeg Square and 5 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car. The property is situated 2.8 km from National Sport Park Resort, 1.1 km from Rinia Park and 1.2 km from Ethem Bey Mosque. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, slippers and a hairdryer. At Hotel Rex rooms have bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Rex include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, House of Leaves and National Museum of History Albania. The nearest airport is Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

hotels.name: Hotel Opera
hotels.address: Rruga Urani Pano 1016 Tirana Albania 1016 TiranaAlbania
hotels.description:
The elegant Hotel Opera is set in Tirana and features an on-site restaurant and free WiFi available throughout the property. The hotel is just steps away from Skenderberg Square and from the the National Museum and the National Theatre of Opera and Ballet.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV. Some rooms include a seating area where you can relax. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find slippers and free toiletries.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Opera Hotel also offers a meeting and conference room fitted with state of the art equipment.

Just steps away you will find the Tirana Municipal Hall, the Ministries Square and business centres. The nearest airport is Tirana Airport, 13 km from Hotel Opera. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

hotels.name: Hotel DANIEL
hotels.description:
Situated in Golem, within 300 metres of Mali I Robit Beach and 400 metres of Golem Beach, Guesthouse Daniel features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 3-star guest house offers a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen. The guest house has family rooms.

At the guest house, every room is fitted with a terrace with a garden view. At Guesthouse Daniel rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a Full English/Irish breakfast.

Guests at Guesthouse Daniel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Golem, like fishing.

Shkëmbi i Kavajës Beach is 2.4 km from the guest house, while Skanderbeg Square is 46 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 39 km from Guesthouse Daniel. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Guesthouse Daniel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
A damage deposit of EUR 100 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

hotels.description:
Located in Shëngjin, 300 metres from Ylberi Beach, Hotel ANTAG provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Providing a bar, the property is located within less than 1 km of Shëngjin Beach. The accommodation offers room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel offers a childrens playground. You can play table tennis at Hotel ANTAG.

Rozafa Castle Shkodra is 41 km from the accommodation, while Lake Skadar is 43 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa, 48 km from Hotel ANTAG, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Located right on the beach, 10 km from the centre of Durrës, Guesthouse Villa Daniele features a private beach area with free-to-use sun loungers and parasols. It offers an on-site bar and restaurant. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a furnished balcony overlooking the sea. Each one includes cable TV, a fridge and a private bathroom with a shower. Towels and linen are also provided.

A grocery shop is just a few steps away. A bus stop with lines to the centre is 1 km away. The port of Durrës is 6 km from the Villa Daniele Guesthouse.

Tirana Airport is 35 km away. The property offers free parking. Please inform Guesthouse Villa Daniele in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

hotels.name: Villa Arber
hotels.description:
Bella Napoli Hotel enjoys a hilltop position among olive trees in Golem, Kavajë. Surrounded by a large garden, it overlooks the bay of Durrës and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

Each room features a balcony, cable TV and a private bathroom with shower. Some offer sea views, while some come with a garden view. A shared terrace with sun loungers offers panoramic views and invites to relax.

The Bella Napoli Hotels restaurant serves Albanian specialities and Italian cuisine. Its guests can enjoy al fresco dining. The selection of hot and cold drinks is available at the bar.

The nearest beach is 1.3 km from the Bella Napoli Hotel. The town of Durrës is 11 km away. Free on-site parking is provided.

Opened in 2010, this modern hotel is 4 km from the centre of Tirana. It offers free Wi-Fi and spacious rooms with air conditioning and LCD satellite TVs.

All rooms at the Prince Hotel feature a minibar and a bathroom with hairdryer.

The restaurant serves Albanian and international cuisine. Guests can relax in the bar and on the terrace. Room service is also available.

Free private parking is available on site. Various shops are nearby, and a bus stop is just 50 metres away from Hotel Prince. Please inform Prince Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. hotels.name: Padam Boutique Hotel & Restaurant
hotels.description:
Located in the centre of Tirana, Padam Boutique Hotel features uniquely furnished rooms decorated in Victorian and vintage style with a dash of modern luxury. The villa offers high ceilings and is surrounded by a lush garden and veranda where guests can enjoy a perfect afternoon getaway while sipping a cocktail.

All accommodation units feature unique luxury furniture pieces and soft intimate illumination. Modern amenities include air-conditioning, flat-screen TV, a minibar and free Wi-Fi connection.

The Padam Boutique Restaurant is decorated in a retro style and serves nouvelle-cuisine and a selective wine list. Breakfast is served every morning at the restaurant and the bar offers classic drinks and creative cocktails. Guests can dine and relax outside during the warmer months.

Among the apartment blocks of Blloku neighbourhood, 2 km away, guests can find some of Tiranas best cafés, shops and restaurants. A shopping centre is also available just 300 metres from the Padam Boutique Hotel. Guests can park for free at the private car park.

Local buses stop 150 metres from the hotel. Tirana Train Station is 2 km from Hotel Padam, while the Bus Station is 1 km away. Tirana Airport can be reached in 30 km.

hotels.description:
Set in Tirana, 5.2 km from Skanderbeg Square, Hotel Akropoli offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is around 8.5 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car, 6.2 km from Former Residence of Enver Hoxha and 40 km from Rock of Kavaje. Sky Tower is 400 metres from Artistic Tirana Blloku, while National Theatre of Opera and Ballet is 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana Airport, 14 km from the property.

hotels.description:
Located in Tirana, 7.3 km from Skanderbeg Square, HOTEL ARANDI AG provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. 11 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car and 6.5 km from Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, the property features a restaurant and a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. At HOTEL ARANDI AG each room includes bed linen and towels.

An Italian breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Rock of Kavaje is 48 km from HOTEL ARANDI AG, while Bektashi World Centre is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

Situated in Golem, 100 metres from Mali I Robit Beach, Kolaveri Resort features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With a bar, the 3-star resort has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can make use of a garden.

At the resort, the rooms include a wardrobe. All rooms at Kolaveri Resort are fitted with a TV with cable channels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast.

hotels.name: Germany Hotel
hotels.description:
Germany Hotel is located in Durrës, 2.6 km from Port of Durres and 3.8 km from Durres Amphiteatre. The hotel has a terrace and a private beach area, 50 metres from the hotel. Guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.

All the rooms are elegantly decorated. Each is air-conditioned and offers a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Every room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower and bidet, with free toiletries provided.

You will find luggage storage space at the property. Laundry service is available at a surcharge.

The nearest airport is Tirana Airport, 22 km from Germany Hotel. Airport shuttle can be arranged for a fee and upon previous request.

hotels.description:
HeadLine : Near Tanners Bridge

Location : Hotel Drinos is centrally located in Tirana, a 4-minute walk from Tirana Parliament and 5 minutes by foot from Toptani Shopping Center. This hotel is 0.6 mi (1 km) from Pyramid and 0.7 mi (1.1 km) from Municipality of Tirana.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 6 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your memory foam bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature slippers and hair dryers.

Dining : Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • This property only accepts cash

Special Instructions : If you are planning to arrive after 6:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

hotels.name: Hotel Adriatik
hotels.description:
Adriatik Hotel is located just a few steps from the beach and 5 km from the Centre of Durres, it offers Spa Centre, a bar and a restaurant with a terrace, an outdoor and indoor swimming pool and sports facilities. Free Wi-Fi and parking are provided.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a desk, a TV, a phone and a minibar. Each bathroom provides a bath.

The on-site restaurant serves traditional Albanian specialties and Italian food. A grocery store can be found 50 metres from the hotel. Local buses stop is 50 metres away from the property.

There is a private beach with umbrellas and sun loungers available for all guests. A childrens playground and a fitness centre are free of charge, while tennis courts, spa and sauna facilities are available at an additional cost.

Tirana International Airport can be reached in 30 km, while a Ferry Port is available 4 km from Hotel Adriatik. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Adriatik Hotel, BW Premier Collection in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property adheres to strict physical distancing measures.
Swimming pool #1 Outdoor Pool is closed from Mon 16 Oct 2023 until Mon 20 May 2024

hotels.name: Gloria Palace
hotels.description:
Situated in Golem, 600 metres from Mali I Robit Beach, Gloria Palace Hotel & SPA features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel has a sauna and an ATM.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options.

Gloria Palace Hotel & SPA offers 5-star accommodation with a spa centre.

Qerret Beach is 700 metres from the accommodation, while Golem Beach is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 42 km from Gloria Palace Hotel & SPA. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. hotels.name: La Voglia Boutique Hotel
hotels.description:
Located in Tirana and with Skanderbeg Square reachable within 100 metres, La Voglia Hotel Boutique provides express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. 5 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car and 800 metres from Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, the property features a shared lounge and a casino. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

All rooms are modernly furnished with contemporary colorful decor. Free private parking is offered for those who drive. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a microwave, a coffee machine, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel every room is equipped with a wardrobe and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at La Voglia Hotel Boutique.

The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation.

Popular points of interest near La Voglia Hotel Boutique include Rinia Park, Ethem Bey Mosque and National Gallery of Arts Tirana. The nearest airport is Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform La Voglia Hotel Boutique in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

HeadLine : In Rrashbull

Location : With a stay at Adriatik Hills Apartments COMPLEX in Rrashbull, you ll be within a 15-minute drive of Saint Pavel and Saint Ast Orthodox Church and Forum & Roman Baths. This guesthouse is 27.1 mi (43.5 km) from Ministry of Defense and 27.2 mi (43.7 km) from Skanderbeg Square.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 8 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and plasma televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries.

Dining : Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.

  • This property accepts cash

Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. The front desk is open daily from 7:00 AM - 11:00 PM. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Ministry of Justice - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
National Arts Gallery - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for VH Eurostar Tirana Hotel & Congress is Nene Tereza Intl. Airport (TIA) - 16.9 km / 10.5 mi
hotels.description:
HeadLine : Near Palace of Culture

Location : With a stay at VH Eurostar Tirana Hotel & Congress, you ll be centrally located in Tirana, just a 4-minute walk from Ministry of Justice and 10 minutes by foot from National Arts Gallery. This family-friendly hotel is 1 mi (1.5 km) from Ministry of Defense and 1.1 mi (1.7 km) from Skanderbeg Square.

Rooms : Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 150 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring fireplaces and private plunge pools. Your memory foam bed comes with down comforters and Frette Italian sheets, and all rooms are furnished with king sofa beds. Kitchens are outfitted with ovens, stovetops, and espresso makers. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 42-inch flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms have jetted bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

Dining : Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel s many dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/cafes. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Wind down with a drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges or 2 poolside bars. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash
  • Long-term renters welcome
  • Noise-free guestrooms cannot be guaranteed

Special Instructions : This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

hotels.name: The Crown Hotel Tirana
hotels.address: 17 Rruga George W. Bush Tirana  Albania
hotels.description:
Situated in Tirana and with Skanderbeg Square reachable within 500 metres, The Crown Boutique Hotel & SPA features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a shared lounge, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms are equipped with a kettle, while some rooms have a balcony and others also feature city views. At The Crown Boutique Hotel & SPA the rooms include bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or Italian options.

The accommodation provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying.

Popular points of interest near The Crown Boutique Hotel & SPA include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, Toptani Shopping Centre and National Gallery of Arts Tirana. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

hotels.name: Doanesia Premium Hotel & Spa
hotels.description:
Situated in Tirana, 4.8 km from Skanderbeg Square, Doanesia Premium Hotel & Spa features accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to an indoor pool and a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, an ATM and free WiFi.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Doanesia Premium Hotel & Spa the rooms include bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or American breakfast.

Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar.

Dajti Ekspres Cable Car is 8.7 km from Doanesia Premium Hotel & Spa, while Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 10 km from the hotel. Please inform Doanesia Premium Hotel & Spa in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.

hotels.name: Pandora Residence Apartments
hotels.description:
Located in a quiet residential area near Elbasani Street, Pandora Residence Apartments features free WiFi and free private parking.. The property is just steps away from the Grand Park which houses the Artificial Lake, the Amphitheatre and the Botanic Garden.

Featuring modern interiors with marble floor, each apartment is equipped with a full kitchen and dining area. There is also a seating area with a flat-screen TV, as well as a private bathroom, in each unit.

The property runs a 24-hour front desk, and is 500 metres from several restaurants that serve various cuisines. The Archaeological Museum, the Pyramid, Skanderbeg Square, the National Museum, the Ethem Bey Mosque and the Clock Tower can all be reached with a 15-minute walk.

A public bus stop with lines to the centre is right next to the property. The nearest airport is Tirana Airport, 20 km from the property. Please inform Pandora Residence Apartments in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

hotels.name: Hotel Bora Bora
hotels.description:
Its a brand new building and it renovates the apartments every year. It has a nice bar outside, a volley field and a pool table. there is a big parking area which is free of charge for our clients. Set just 500 metres from the beach, Hotel Bora Bora velipoja is 1 km from the centre of Velipoje. Built in 2011, it offers and on-site bar with a terrace and air-conditioned accommodation with a flat-screen satellite TV.

All rooms come with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some accommodation units also comprise a kitchenette and a furnished balcony.

Currency exchange is available on site. Various restaurants serving traditional Albanian cuisine, Italian and international dishes can be found in the vicinity. The nearest grocery store is 30 metres away.

Bike and car rental can be organised on site. Excursions to Shkodra, Lezha and Kruja, as well as hiking, biking and fishing can be organised at the hotel. Karaoke and evening entertainment are also provided.

A bus station is 700 metres away. Shengjin Port is 35 km from the Hotel Bora Bora velipoja. Tirana Airport is at a distance of 93 km. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Situated within 2.2 km of Durres Beach in Golem, Apartments Golem features accommodation with free WiFi and seating area.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, and some have a flat-screen TV, washing machine, a kettle, completed with a kitchen.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace.

The nearest airport is Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa, 23 km from Apartments Golem, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Apartments Golem in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

hotels.name: Apartment's Idea
hotels.description:
Located in heart of Tirana, just 250 metres from Skenderbeg Square, Signature Idea hotel features a small Spa Centre, beauty shop and a cafe bar on site. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are provided. All major attractions are reachable in a short walk.

Air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. En-suite bathroom provides a shower, slippers and bathrobe.

Breakfast is served at the hotels dining room each morning. A restaurant serving local specialties and international cuisine is just a few steps away. A grocery shop can be found 20 metres away.

The Spa Area features a Turkish Bath, a sauna, a hot tub, massages and beauty treatments that can be arranged for an additional cost. Massages are done by Philippine masseuses.

Sports facilities such as tennis and football courts and an outdoor pool are 2 km from Signature Idea hotel. A tourist agency is just a few steps away, while night time entertainment can be found 2 km from the hotel.

Local buses with lines to the airport and nearby towns stop 300 metres from the hotel. Main Train Station is 1 km away, while Tirana Airport can also be reached in 15 km. Please inform Signature Idea hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

hotels.name: Hotel Epidamn
hotels.description:
Located in Durrës, 400 metres from Currila Beach, Hotel Epidamn Boutique & Spa provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a hammam and a spa centre. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and free toiletries, guest rooms at Hotel Epidamn Boutique & Spa have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are equipped with a terrace. All units will provide guests with a fridge.

An à la carte, continental or Italian breakfast is available daily at the property.

Kallmi Beach is 2 km from the accommodation, while Durres Beach is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 34 km from Hotel Epidamn Boutique & Spa.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Dining : At Sole Luna Hotel, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the beach bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM.

hotels.name: Splendor
hotels.address: Dhërmi Beach Prane Viles Qeveritare DhërmiVlorë
hotels.description:
Located 150 metres from the nearest beach that offers free sun loungers and parasols, Splendor Hotel & Spa offers an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a sauna free of charge. Free Wi-Fi is provided in public areas.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature extra large beds, a sofa and a flat-screen cable TV. Each one comes with a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms comprise a private balcony and all rooms overlook either the mountains or the sea.

An on-site à la carte restaurant and breakfast buffet cater to guests appetites, while the on-site bar offers refreshments. Splendor Hotel & Spa has a childrens playground located on property grounds, and it also offers spa and wellness services at an additional cost.

Distance to the Main Bus Station measures 1,5 km, while Dhërmi town centre is 2 km from the property. Llogara National Park is 20 km away. Tirana Airport is located at a distance of 260 km and airport shuttle service is available at a surcharge. Sauna is closed from Wed 15 Sept 2021 until Wed 15 Jun 2022
Spa/wellness centre is closed from Wed 15 Sept 2021 until Wed 15 Jun 2022
Hot tub/jacuzzi is closed from Wed 15 Sept 2021 until Wed 15 Jun 2022
Piscina n. 1 is closed from Wed 15 Sept 2021 until Wed 15 Jun 2022

hotels.name: Drymades Inn
hotels.description:
Situated right on the sandy beach in Dhërmi, Drymades Inn Resort has an outdoor pool and offers air-conditioned rooms housed in wooden cottages. The resort includes a bar with terrace overlooking the beach, while the restaurant offers panoramic sea views through its large windows.

LCD cable TV, fridge and a private balcony or terrace are standard facilities for all rooms. Drymades Inn is surrounded by olive trees and other Mediterranean greenery.

Free Wi-Fi is possible in public areas of the resort, while free public parking is available nearby. Guests are free to use the parasols on site, and they can also book massage treatments at an extra charge.

Dhërmi is a peaceful little place on the SH8 State Road, which connects Vlorë and Sarandë.

hotels.name: Royal Blue Hotel
hotels.description:
Situated just 500 metres from the centre of Dhërmi, Royal Blue Hotel offers free Wi-Fi and free private parking. The property offers an à-la-carte restaurant, while the beach is just a few steps away.

All accommodation units offer a view of the sea, a balcony, a TV, a small fridge and a private bathroom with shower.

There is a grocery shop 50 metres away, while a bar can be reached in just a few steps. Guests can visit the Kalaja e Pirateve Fortress located nearby. A tourist agency can be reached in 300 metres.

Local buses stop 100 metres away and feature lines to Himare, Saranda and Vlore a few times a day. The Ferry Port can be found in Vlore 40 km away, while Tirana Airport can be reached in 260 km.

hotels.name: Relax Hotel
hotels.address: 1 Km Himare Rruga Nacionale Dhermi - HimareDhërmi
hotels.description:
Relax Hotel in Dhermi, Himara, is set 1 km from Dhermi village and  3 km from the Dhermi Beach. The hotel features an outdoor pool with a terrace that offers sun loungers and parasols and a restaurant that serves Albanian and Italian dishes.

Rooms are equipped with air-conditioning, a TV, a fridge and a private bathroom with shower. All rooms also offer a balcony that offers views of the Ionian Sea and the island of Corfu.

The hotel is located on the national road to Himara, which is 17 km south. Numerous beaches can be found in the vicinity or Dhermi, such as Gjipea beach, 3 km away, Jala beach, 10 km away or Porto Palermo, 20 km away.

In Dhermi village guests can also find a grocery shop, a post office and an ATM. Tiranas Mother Theresa International Airport is a 4-hour drive away. Please inform Hotel Relax Dhermi in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Swimming pool #1 is closed from Wed 20 Sept 2023 until Fri 17 May 2024
A damage deposit of EUR 10 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

hotels.name: Yard Paradise Hotel
hotels.description:
Featuring a lush garden with various flowers and trees, the family-run Yard Paradise Hotel Dhermi offers rooms with free private parking and free WiFi. It is located on the road connecting State Road SH8 with the popular Drymades Beach.

The hotel snack bar serves fresh drinks during the summer season. Guests can enjoy marvellous views of the sea and the high mountains in the hinterland.

All units have either a balcony or terrace, as well as a fridge and a TV. The bathroom comes with shower.

The reception desk is open 24 hours a day. The property features a spacious furnished garden area in which guests can relax.

Llogara National Park is about 15 km away along the SH8.

hotels.name: Hotel Imperial
hotels.description:
Located 1 km from the centre of Dhërmi, Hotel Imperial offers an on-site restaurant that serves traditional Albanian dishes. The air-conditioned rooms come with balconies or terraces, and free Wi-Fi access is available.

All accommodation units are cable TV, a fridge and a coffee machine. Each one comes with a bathroom that includes a shower and free toiletries. Some units come with a fully equipped kitchen.

The Imperial Hotel also offers an on-site bar with a terrace. A private beach area equipped with free-to-use sun loungers and parasols is 2.5 km away. The property organises boat tours, as well as visits to local attractions such as the Butrint archaeological site.

The nearest grocery shop is 100 metres from the property. The town of Himara is 16 km away and Llogara National Park is located at a distance 20 km.

Buses to Himara, Durres, Sarandë and Vllore stop right in front of the Imperial. Free private parking is provided on site. Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.

hotels.name: Hotel Ionian
hotels.description:
Ionian Hotel is a new and fully equipped / renovated complex that makes your holiday enjoyable.
Our hotel is located on the beautiful beach "Perivolos" Dhermi the village where the blue waters combined with beautiful mountainside It will amaze you and make your experience of visiting ... simply unforgettable.

The village of Drymades/Dhermi , one of the seven villages of Himara, is the second village that can be visited by a traveler going from the national park Logaras to the citys streams. Located at the foot of mountainous Acroceraunian. That makes the village of Dhermi a beautiful place, surrounded by the huge green stripes of olive and citrus trees, watching from high above the beautiful beach and the wonderful Ionian Sea.

The Dhermi placed in the center of a long beach, 5 km, starting from the peninsula Karaburuni and ends in the hills, on which stands the monastery of St. Theodore. Enjoying a beachfront position, Hotel Ionian offers an on-site restaurant serving local and International specialties. Free WiFi is provided in common areas. The centre of Dhërmi is 3 km away. Free on-site parking is provided.

Each room is air-conditioned and provides a cable TV and a private bathroom featuring a shower. You can enjoy a sea view from some of the rooms. Some rooms also provide a seating area.

Other facilities offered at the property include a washing machine which can be used upon request.

Llogara National Park is about 15 km away, while the town of Himare is 25 km from the Ionian Hotel.

hotels.name: Hotel Belle Vue
hotels.description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers and parasols, Hotel Belle Vue is set 850 metres from Dhërmi Beach and 1.5 km from the city centre. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and a restaurant.

A TV with satellite channels and air conditioning are provided in each room, as well as a private bathroom. Certain units have views of the sea or mountains.

Free WiFi is available throughout the property and free on-site private parking is provided.

Sarandë is 74 km away.

hotels.address: Rr. Perivolo Drimadhes Beach9422 DhërmiQark Vlora
hotels.description:
Located in Dhërmi, 1.4 km from Palasa Beach, La Maroja View Hotel provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to a barbecue. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, luggage storage space and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at La Maroja View Hotel have a TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms come with a balcony. At the accommodation each room has bed linen and towels.

A continental breakfast is available daily at La Maroja View Hotel.

Dhermi Beach is 2.2 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Ioannina Airport, 162 km from La Maroja View Hotel. Please inform La Maroja View Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

hotels.name: Hotel Keisa
hotels.description:
Offering a spacious rooftop terrace with views of the Ionian Sea, Hotel Keisa is set only few steps away from pebbly Dhermi Beach. Guests can use free private parking and enjoy an on-site restaurant.

With free WiFi and air-conditioning included, every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Units come with a private balcony, some of them offering a sea view. Each room includes a bathroom fitted with a shower and a bidet.

Numerous hotels and bars can be found in a 20-minute walk along the coast from the Keisa Hotel.

Llogora National Park can be reached in a 18 km drive and the closest town is Vlorë, 55 km from the property. Please inform Hotel Keisa in advance of your expected arrival time. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property and free private parking is available on site.

A seating area is provided for guests convenience. Some units feature views of the mountains or garden. Every room is fitted with a TV and a private bathroom with a bath and bidet. Bath robes, slippers and free toiletries provided.

hotels.name: Hotel Gjirokastra
hotels.address: Lagjia Partizani Rruga Shezai Como Lagjia Partizani6001 Gjirokaster
hotels.description:
Hotel Gjirokastër is located 300 metres from the centre, in a part of town famous for numerous museums. The hotel is surrounded by green gardens and large parks, while the building itself is made of traditional stone and wood. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are provided.

All rooms at Gjirokastër Hotel offer cable TV and a private bathroom with shower. Rooms are also air-conditioned and feature a wardrobe and a sofa.

Breakfast and dinner are served each day at the hotel restaurant, while room service is also available. Guests can make use of dry cleaning, laundry and ironing facilities for an additional cost.

The entire town of Gjirokastër is UNESCO-protected and the famous Gjirokastër Castle is just 50 metres away. The town features an old Ottoman bazaar originally opened in the 17th century. More than 200 homes are preserved as cultural monuments.

The bus station can be reached in 500 metres. The town of Saranda is 60 km away, while the nearest airport is Tirana Airport, 200 km from Hotel Gjirokastër.

hotels.name: Hotel Relax
hotels.description:
Located in the very centre of Gjirokastër, 300 metres from the Gjirokastër fortress, Hotel Relax runs a 24-hour front desk and offers an on-site bar. Free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby.

All rooms are air-conditioned and come with a TV. Each room also offers a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Some rooms have a private balcony.

A restaurant serving local and international food is just a few steps away. The local marketplace is 50 metres from the hotel. The nearest nightclub is Bellas, 500 metres away.

Gjirokastër offers various sights for guests to enjoy. The ethnographic museum is 500 metres from the Relax, and a 17th century Ottoman Bazaar is 700 metres away. Several hiking trails and cycling tracks can be found within a 500-metre radius.

A public bus stop with lines around the town is 50 metres away. The Main Bus Station is 3 km from the property. Free public parking is available nearby.

The Castle, Ethnographic Museum and Ottoman Era Museum Houses can be reached within a 10-minute walk.

Various hiking and biking excursions in the surrounding mountains can be organised. Viroi Lake is 5 km away, while the popular coastal town of Sarandë can be reached in a 1-hour drive. hotels.name: Bed and Breakfast Kotoni
hotels.address: Rruga Bashkim Kokon Lagja Paloso Lagja Palorto6001 Gjirokastër
hotels.description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and TV in its traditionally decorated rooms, B&B Kotoni is housed in a 3 centuries old historic landmark in the UNESCO-protected town of Gjirokastër. Made from Ottoman stone, all rooms are hand built, including handmade wooden ceilings.

The à la carte restaurant serves traditional Albanian specialities. There is a bus station just 50 metres from the Kotoni, while the Gjirokastër Obelisk and Mosque are within easy walking distance.

The famous Gjirokastër Fortress and the Ethnographic Museum are 200 metres away. The old Bazaar is at a distance of 300 metres from the Kotoni B&B. Please inform Bed and Breakfast Kotoni in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

hotels.description:
Situated in Gjirokaster in the Gjirokaster County Region, 25 km from Sarande, Hotel Shtino boasts a terrace and rooms with balconies and views of the mountains and castle.

Some rooms are air-conditioned, while all rooms come with a private bathroom.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The property also offers traditional lunch and dinner options.

hotels.name: Palorto Hotel
hotels.description:
Set in Gjirokastër, Palorto Hotel offers 3-star accommodation with a shared lounge and a terrace. With a garden, the 3-star inn has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers free shuttle service, room service and currency exchange for guests.

All rooms come with a flat-screen TV, and certain units at the inn have a city view. The units will provide guests with a fridge.

Guests at Palorto Hotel can enjoy an American breakfast.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Gjirokastër, like cycling.

Speaking English and Italian at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Zaravina lake is 45 km from Palorto Hotel. The nearest airport is Ioannina Airport, 83 km from the inn.

hotels.name: Hotel Muse'e
hotels.description:
Situated in Gjirokastër and with Zaravina lake reachable within 45 km, Boutique Hotel Musée features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and room service for guests.

All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also feature a city view. At Boutique Hotel Musée the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include Greek, English and Italian.

The nearest airport is Ioannina Airport, 83 km from the accommodation. Please inform Boutique Hotel Musée in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

hotels.name: Hotel Bineri
hotels.description:
Boasting a garden, bar and views of city, Hotel Bineri is situated in Gjirokastër, 44 km from Zaravina lake. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, each room has a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Hotel Bineri have a TV and air conditioning, and some rooms include a terrace. At the accommodation rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at Hotel Bineri. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, local and international cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and dairy-free options can also be requested.

The nearest airport is Ioannina Airport, 83 km from Hotel Bineri.

hotels.name: Mare Bed & Breakfast Hotel
hotels.address: National Road Himara Saranda 1St Km PotamiHimara
hotels.description:
With a pebbly beach right in front and several other beaches in the vicinity, Mare Bed & Breakfast offers comfortable accommodation in a modern house. It is situated in the Himarë Gulf of the Ionian Sea and surrounded by the untouched Llogara Mountains. Free Wi-Fi is provided in public areas.

All rooms at the Mare Bed & Breakfast are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms feature panoramic views of the Himarë Gulf, while others face the mountains.

Mare serves a buffet breakfast. Private parking is available on site. SH8 state road connecting Vlorë and Sarandë is easily accessible.

Downtown Himarë is 1 km away, and the Old Town is 2 km from Mare Bed & Breakfast. Porto Palermo Castle is 8 km to the south. The canyon of Gypea and its beach is 9 km to the north. Llogara National Park is 30 km north-west along the SH8.

A grocery store is only 20 metres away. There is a bus stop just outside the hotel. Restaurants and bars can be reached within the radius of 50 metres. Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service operating hours.

hotels.name: Rapos Resort
hotels.description:
Rapos Resort Hotel is located 50 metres from a pebbly beach and 1.5 km from the centre of Himare. It offers a bar and restaurant with a terrace, an outdoor pool and a private beach. Free Wi-Fi and parking are provided.

All rooms are fitted with air-conditioning, a minibar, a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Private bathroom provides a shower. Most rooms overlook the sea.

The on-site restaurant serves traditional Albanian and international specialties. There is a childrens playground nearby, while a night club can be reached in a short walk. There is also a grocery store nearby.

The nearby tourist agency offers excursions to historic sites of interest, while jet ski rental is possible at the nearby beach.

Local buses stop just a few steps away, while the Main Bus Stop is 1.5 km away. Ferry Port in Saranda, with lines to Corfu Island is 52 km away. Please inform Rapos Resort Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
